Review.Titre: Did not correct the problem and gave no…
Review.Contenu: Did not correct the problem and gave no advice on how to fix it

Review.Titre: May Loose Your Data
Review.Contenu: I used a Neat scanner and software for personal finances for years than they abruptly dropped product support for individuals in favor of their small business product line. Don't trust them with valuabke data, you may not be able to access it when you need it in the future. ilt's all proprietary and when they drop support for your product or raise prices above your current ability to pay, so sorry for you.

Review.Titre: This company is a foreign company that rips you off.
Review.Contenu: I gave up on my data in 2015 after they canceled a wonderful program and moved to the cloud. I am a doctor and they are not HIPAA compliant. I spent the last 2 years with them getting zero help from their customer service before giving up. For awhile I could get into my data and then that stopped. I lost access to all of those years of data, about 10. I just recently received an email saying they were going to dump my old data. I had to pay $250 to download it, which turned out to be a lie. I did their 30 day trial making it clear I was going to get my data and get my money back in the trial. Cancelling the free 30 days as Val told me would be no problem came with a lot of jargon that would preclude I would NOT get my money back or my data. Another lie. I called billing and left my number for a call back. She just called back and hung up. I assume because I couldn't hear her and told her that; unless it was Val who hung up on me. She claimed to be the sales representative and customer service. She didn't have a clue how to download the data. As others have found they haven't changed and it is now 8 years since my data was deemed useless.

Review.Titre: Neat is a predatory company that does…
Review.Contenu: Neat is a predatory company that does not allow customers to cancel their service when no longer needed.  They charged us for another year after we updated our credit card for a monthly subscription, then charged us for a year.  Horrible company.

Review.Titre: I didn't get answers to the problem and…
Review.Contenu: I didn't get answers to the problem and it seems I have more  missing file trouble now.  I'm going to call and see if talking to a person I may be able to  help you understand what the problem is.

Review.Titre: Had it with Neat.com
Review.Contenu: I purchased a scanner and program about 8 years ago. Loved it. Easy to use software, very consumer friendly. I had a small business and it worked very well for me. And then...they made changes in their software and everything is cloud based. Awful. Have spent hours with their "experts" only to have them ultimately agree that the software is lacking. Have set phone appointments and never got calls. Chat never open. The rates doubled but the product diminished. I literally threw hard earned money out the window. A few customer service agents have been nice to deal with but have no power to improve the software. Lots of excuses...meanwhile they collected $264. Ultimately I was told the only way to get the expense report (simple request!) is to pull it together manually. Really. How inefficient. And what did I pay for then? If I cancel I lose access to all my past years data. Cannot export it...really crummy. I tried the last 2 years to be "useful" and "helpful." Now I am just mad.

Review.Titre: It has been 2 years we have been having…
Review.Contenu: It has been 2 years we have been having difficulty logging in from the 1st time. it takes us sometimes up to 10 times to login. called customers service many times and they always blame it on our internet connection despite having a very reliable and very fast internet speed.for the past 3 weeks we are completely unable to login to access our documents. NO HELP FROM CUSTOMER SERVICEI contacted our IT department, they tried different browsers even different network outside our company  yet still the same problem.Really bad and inexperienced customer service. Even trying to cancel service and retrieve our documents is unsuccessful. I hope this review reaches a senior customer service or a supervisor who can help otherwise we will take a different course of action as Neat have possession of our confidential documents and we don't

Review.Titre: i HAVE BEEN A NEAT CUSTOMER SINCE 2015
Review.Contenu: i HAVE BEEN A NEAT CUSTOMER SINCE 2015.  I TRIED TODAY WITH 2 OF YOUR FOLKS AND IT IS CLEAR YOUR PRODUCT WILL NO LONGER WORK FOR ME.  YOUR OLD SYSTEM WAS GREAT. NOW IT SUCKS.....!!!!CAPTAIN TOM HANCHETT

Review.Titre: It is good until you try to delete your…
Review.Contenu: It is good until you try to delete your account!It got worse when I was told to go call in. I was the #1 call in and I waited 15 mins. no body answered, so I hug up. NO your still BAD! USELESS!

Review.Titre: No sales support whatsoever
Review.Contenu: No sales support whatsoever. No clear connection between past products and their current line. I have a client with an older version and can find no way to get information as to what they should do to migrate to a new computer system. Apparently they want me to buy something to get support but with no sales support, I can't even figure out what to buy. As an IT professional, everything about this company screams "Run Away!"

Review.Titre: I received a Neat scanner from my mom
Review.Contenu: I received a Neat scanner from my mom. Initially I thought I would be set up quickly. However It took hours. I chatted with three reps, too were  unhelpful. Finally the third rep had to remote into into my computer and fixed it within five minutes. I told him I wish I had spoken to him first so that I hadn’t wasted so much time. I believe companies are as good as their customer service and I wouldn’t recommend Neat.

Review.Titre: Less Than Worthless It Cost Us Money to Get Rid of Them
Review.Contenu: There is no way the reviews listed on this site are forthcoming.  It is unreliable at best.  The transition to this monthly subscription was done after my office bought a dozen units.  A year later and monthly issues they transition to this scam of monthly subscriptions.  The support is horrible and the product way out dated.

Review.Titre: I loved Neat Desk, The Neat Company. Neat.com
Review.Contenu: I loved Neat Company. Neat desk/ Neat.com until they went money hungry!! I will not use it any more. Got a regular scanner so they can't control my downloads or charge me to use what I already paid for. Nothing but propaganda!!I have tried to download the product driver from the CD purchased around 7yrs ago and all it will do is direct me to a website wanting money.

Review.Titre: Gimmick to up sale again & again
Review.Contenu: I would avoid this product if you are using for business.  They up sale you hundreds of dollars on upgrades then within a year try to up sale another $600 plus. It works for small small amount of receipts but "too many" and freezes up. Their tech support is a sales team.  When you get a tech they just tell you to use this you need to upgrade

Review.Titre: I have to believe that NEAT wrote these…
Review.Contenu: I have to believe that NEAT wrote these reviews.  I have not been able to figure out from their FAQs how to migrate legacy NEAT data into their new cloud version.  Moreover, their online assistant was useless.  I left my number several times, and even though their website says I will receive a call when they get back on a weekday.  That did not happen. I recommend to anyone considering updgrading, to not do it.  You are flushing money down the toilet.

Review.Titre: We were told by a representative at…
Review.Contenu: We were told by a representative at Neat that when we hit the max amount of scans we would be able to pay the difference of $750 for additional scans up to 3,000. When we went to increase the number of scans to use we were told that was not the case and forced to pay $350 for another 1200 scans. The company is not standing by their word! False advertising.

Review.Titre: Never purchase this software.
Review.Contenu: Every time they update it gets worst.  Purchase a scanner based on Neat recommendation but they then tell me they do not fully support.  Many of the links are dead from support.  Worst of all they have no way out, once in your stuck!!!!Never purchase this software.I have reached out to support several times and get no help.  Last attempt requested information from me but gave no way to get it to them!!

Review.Titre: I had a problem with my PAID…
Review.Contenu: I had a problem with my PAID subscription.  At first, all was well, however, the online connection was lost, the tech did not call to tell me, so I hung out on my computer for over an hour, waiting for something to happen.  Later that day, she finally called back to tell me the connection was lost and COULD SHE CALL THE NEXT DAY?  I said yes, we agreed on a time and I waited TWO hours and she has not yet called back - TWO days have passed!

Review.Titre: Check you subscription. This company has overcharged me 2 years…
Review.Contenu: This company has overcharged me 2 years running. My bad the first year. I didn't catch the charge almost 700 dollars for one year. I did not sign up for this kind of plan (personal use) and this year I caught the charge on the card for 750 dollars. I was paying 89 dollars a year for an annual plan up until last year. I frankly have been remiss in not keeping up with the Neat scanning of receipts and missed this charge. I went to the website for support and could not connect to a customer service chat (it looks like the link is dead) and the website site says sorry, no refunds.

Review.Titre: They have worst customer service
Review.Contenu: They have worst customer service. Especially when they charge your card automatically every year. Then when you called them they said they have no record of call. They files size are very big that cannot be emailed. I have worst experience with this scanner. Plus scanner parts they make good money and sometimes it cant be repaired.

Review.Titre: Awesome customer service
Review.Contenu: was unable to connect scanner to desktop so raised a ticket & within 24 hours received a call from customer service & issue was resolved. However, within next 24 hours scanner wasn't working well. Images were blur & customer services told us to buy a new scanner as they can't do anything. Our scanner was not more 2 years old.

Review.Titre: Neat left all its legacy customers in a…
Review.Contenu: Neat left all its legacy customers in a pickle by dropping support for its traditional product and focusing only on its subscription cloud based product.  The legacy product is still used by thousands of users and needs to be supported even it requires a cost.  When I asked who hosted the documents for the cloud solution they would not answer.  I will not trust my private documents to any cloud service.

Review.Titre: The phone rep seemed to barely…
Review.Contenu: The phone rep seemed to barely understand what I wanted him to do. His futile attempts to repeat what I wanted done got to be frustrating. The stupid script needs editing so the reps don't sound so robotic. They need to be trained to ask pertinent questions and listen to the answers so when they get to the scripted question you've alredy answered, the customer won't feel unheard or completely ignored.

Review.Titre: I purchased a NEAT SCANNER used it once…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a NEAT SCANNER used it once and the little display monitor is frozen. I called NEAT since it is still under warranty spoke to a few people after being on hold for 30-40 minutes each time but with no success or help.Before purchasing the Neat  scanner I was reading up on the reviews and the negative feedback but I purchased the scanner anyhow BUT what a mistake!

Review.Titre: Forcing clients to use Neat's paid cloud...
Review.Contenu: Forcing clients to use your paid for cloud services, not right at all!! I paid for the hardware already which came with software!! No longer able to upgrade or get support unless I pay additional for cloud. When someone purchases a product they do so with the understanding of support and upgrades pulling the plug soon after sale without declaring this is very unethical! Not at all impressed and trust in Neat products is gone.

Review.Titre: Not what we paid for
Review.Contenu: Your help tutorials are outdated on your site, the program has been stripped down since these were posted and this is basically just an extra office scanner at this point. Your tech support guy had no idea what I was talking about as if he is still learning what the program does himself.We likely will not re-subscribe unless this program is improved. Add the options back that we paid for in the first place, feels like a ripoff now.

Review.Titre: Worst product ever
Review.Contenu: Worst product ever . You purchases a scanner without being aware that without monthly subscription fees you can’t use it. Then they promise you a free “legacy” software but they make everything possible on their website to make it unavailable for download. So basically you buy a 100usd scanner but you can’t use it without paying $ for a useless software interface

Review.Titre: Awful software that is extremely…
Review.Contenu: Awful software that is extremely riddled with bugs and feature lacking.  Some of the worst support I've had from any technology in my more than 30 years of working in IT. There is now no "local' on-premise option and it's cloud only. Attempts to reach out to people in the company to improve the situational were ignored. Seems like you are clear on who you value and its not the customer. I'm seeking alternatives... Do not buy!

Review.Titre: I have a scanner that I have used for…
Review.Contenu: I have a scanner that I have used for years.  It is apparently no longer supported and therefore was simply taking up space on my desk.  It is no longer useful to me or my business.  This is frustrating and disappointing, to say the least.  I will recycle the equipment and choose another company for my office needs.  I work in a network of a few thousand people in the service industry across the U.S and have, and will continue, sharing this story.

Review.Titre: Took my money and ran. WHAT A RIP OFF!!!!! WHAT A SCAM. CRAP SERVICE, IF ANY.
Review.Contenu: Took my money, wasted countless hours of my time with no positive outcome. Tech took control of my computer and then opened unrelated files on my desktop. Left my system in a non working mode. Created many strange files and then left them on the desktop. A very poorly managed company. Save your money because they could care less about you. They just want you to think they can do as they promise. WHAT A SCAM, AND I FELL FOR IT :(

Review.Titre: Avoid This Company
Review.Contenu: Avoid this company! They are crooked and have horrible customer service. They auto bill your credit card so make sure you don’t allow that! They also say they are an American Company but outsource to the Philippines for Customer Service. Epic failure and a matter of time that their machine becomes a thing of the past!

Review.Titre: I asked about your old software to find…
Review.Contenu: I asked about your old software to find out that it is no longer supported. I can understand that but you should be able to download it  Still. Not interested in your monthly subscription your  cloud service it does not meet my needsI have switched to someone elseDon't reply to this email and remove me from all your email list

Review.Titre: Don't need subscription base software…
Review.Contenu: Don't need subscription base software at this moment just for receipts filing. Very poor migration process from previous legacy software to new subscription base software. Have to export data as PDFs and then import into new software. Lots of errors. Not worth "upgrading" even though legacy software is no longer supported.

Review.Titre: Person on the phone was nice but what…
Review.Contenu: Person on the phone was nice but what she said to do doesn't work. If you buy a product and don't pay for upgrades they disable your software and render the device unusable. I only used my Neat to make occasional PDFs from paper. I didn't buy it to have to use an online service to keep track of receipts. Caveat Emptor...

Review.Titre: Neat Desktop Scanner --- absolutely no support
Review.Contenu: We have a Neat Desktop Scanner which we paid a lot of money for.  We tried to update the latest drivers without success and have been advised that Neat no longer supports/stand behind their products.  It is also impossible to contact anyone at Neat to help address our problem.  A very disappointed customer.

Review.Titre: My Scanner Is Now A Paper Weight
Review.Contenu: My computer got infected so everything was wiped. Upon trying to reconnect my Neat scanner i learned that that drivers are no longer supported by Neat and cannot be downloaded ANYWHERE ELSE!!! It is absolutely ridiculous that the device that was purchased less that 5 yrs ago is now literally a paper weight. For a company to not offer a single solution to people who have purchased their products is down right wrong. Doing business with Neat again is not on my to do list.

Review.Titre: Neat operations
Review.Contenu: To operate Neat Functions,you must pay a large FEE, or you are not able to operate the system.The fee can escalate, due to their discretion. They have  cornered  CUSTOMERS who are not able to perform their tasks if they do not subscribe

Review.Titre: I lost the software for MT neat while…putting it ona new conputer
Review.Contenu: I lost the software for MT neat while putting it on a new computer.When I called neat they wanted me to pay to get the installation software to connect the neat desktop I purchased earlier they wanted to charge me.I feel this was not an action they should have taken on an owner of their equipment.I do hope someone will contact me and explain how they feel this was the way a customer of neat should be treated.I await some to contact me,914 523 1116Vito Porpora I am waiting!

Review.Titre: Update: clickable link does not work.
Review.Contenu: The guy was nice but he stuck to his company policy. Did not provide a clickable link to the legacy software after I stated my case that I did not need or will not use the latest cloud based system and my reasons why. Now I’m stuck, not able to access my backups and one unhappy camper!Update: 5-4-2018. Agent provided link alright, it just doesn’t open. I tried every known way to get it to work to no avail. Sorry NEAT.COM, you had a good system once, but now it is totally broken.

Review.Titre: My Receipts Held For A Ransom
Review.Contenu: Bought a Neat Scanner years ago, came with the software, cost over $300. After years of logging receipts, one day I wake up and can't get into the software to add a receipt. Access denied. My subscription expired. What subscription? I bought your scanner. Didn't sign-up for any subscription! Ohhhhh, now your telling me l have to pay you $162/year subscription to have access to my 100's of receipts. What the #@$%??? Isn't that extortion???? Totally HATING on The Neat Company right now!!!!!!! Do yourself a favor, don't even start dealing with these people!

Review.Titre: Stand alone desktop version should not have become unsupported
Review.Contenu: Have used Neat stand alone desktop for years and loved it.  Then Neat decided to go cloud based and stopped supporting the stand alone version.  I do not have confidence in loading all my personal documents on the cloud.  Now I am forced that find another Stan alone service and tr t transfer years of documents from Neat.

Review.Titre: I don't know how the previous owner or…your r
Review.Contenu: I don't know how the previous owner or tessa Williams was abke to login to my account and cancel my contract with NEAT.I opened a new contract with NEAT on 3/19 on order to keep them from having access to my company records! I spent over 2 hours with your rep reestablishing my account with you. How does that happen?

Review.Titre: Not a trust worthy company
Review.Contenu: Not a trust worthy company. Greed has taken over. Bought neat under original subscription.They changed it and did not adequately notify all their customers. As a result I am now being asked to pay again for a service I already paid for. Had they done that I would have dropped them then and there. No use for them.

Review.Titre: Use to be great now you're terrible.
Review.Contenu: I hate Neat so much now. They use to be great then they did a bait and switch. Now the free software costs a monthly subscription and offers less features and more headaches.  Go back to your old model. You have hurt your old customers and cost me and my business countless hours troubleshooting your nonsense.

Review.Titre: Customer service poor.
Review.Contenu: Neat stopped working and customer service said to check the system requirements. They said I did not have enough memory to run Neat, but my memory was the same as when I installed Neat and it ran for over a year with that configuration. I think they just wanted me to upgrade to a newer Neat version...which would not run on Windows Vista.

Review.Titre: NEAT IS A SCAM
Review.Contenu: I did buy neat -desk years ago.  I used to use the legacy program that is no longer exist, and now it ASKS ME TO SUBSCIPE THE SOFT-WAVE THAT I DO NOT NOT NEED AND I HAVE TO PAY ALMOST 100 $ A YEAR.  A PRINTER WITH SCAN CAN DO ALL OF IT AS I AM NOT A BUSSINESS PERSONVERY DISAPPOINTED AND I THINK IT IS A SCAM!!!

Review.Titre: If you have an older scanner that you…
Review.Contenu: If you have an older scanner that you need to continue to use to scan only (not use their paid cloud subscription) TOO BAD. You can't. I thought I was buying a scanner I could use until it died to scan docs & upload them into my database, but once they stop supporting that version of the scanner, you can't do anything with it unless you pay them a monthly fee, whether you use the cloud or not. So basically, they want to charge for you to use the scanner you already paid $500 for. I will never use them again.

Review.Pseudo: Neat - not so cool.  False advertising.
Review.Titre: It wasn't that my online experience was…
Review.Contenu: It wasn't that my online experience was bad, but I spent a lot of money to buy a Neat scanner only to find out that a paid subscription to make it work is mandatory.   That is nowhere in their TV ads or otherwise.   So I called to talk tp them about it.   No luck.   I would not recommend this product.

Review.Titre: Every one @ Neat is very willing to help but, no one has been able to help
Review.Contenu: I can not get my desktop scanner to work and it is new Neat has just replaced it.  It stops working after it scans.  It closes or crashes after each time it scans, but the mobile works fine.  One tech got on my computer and rearranged some files now my Neat Data file isn't their and all of my folders are gone. I am lost!

Review.Titre: Preferred to be on the old system
Review.Contenu: Preferred to be on the old system. If internet is down, Neat is inaccessible. Access depends on speed and availability of internet. With all the problems with hacking, etc. I don't want all my data on the cloud where I have no control on security. Most companies say they are secure only to find out after the fact that they aren't. And to migrate off of Neat is a very involved process. As I have already shredded most of the original documentation, I feel like I am being held for a monthly ransom to access my data.

Review.Titre: Bate and switch to Software as a Service
Review.Contenu: I purchased hardware that came with software. They converted it into a software subscription program and told me the device they sold me was "not supported." I ended up not being able to calibrate the hardware they sold me. Being told my only viable option was to be a continual cash cow is not a valid option.______________Vendor claims the scanner is no longer compatible with the newer operating systems. What he means is they don't want to support it with the software that's not a subscription service.

Review.Titre: this is the worst software ever
Review.Contenu: this is the worst software ever, never working properly, crashing every few weeks, no live person available to talk to solve it, can not update because the page is kicking me out, it says error each time i log in. it happens few times a year. i am very disappointed I ever purchase it. waste of money

Review.Titre: Horrible transition from 5.7 to current…
Review.Contenu: Horrible transition from 5.7 to current version. Total waste of about 2 hrs and you must be there to let the person in the Philippine’s into your computer. I think a total of 5 calls.  Now I just went to sync it there is a problem.  Must be other easier to use systems out there

Review.Titre: You failed to give me access tp my…
Review.Contenu: You failed to give me access tp my equipment that was supposed to be stand alone meaning not needing a monthly contract to use it. Im out 400 dollars. You should all be very proud of yourself , taking an 80 year old man to the cleaners . More commenly known as stealing. Have a nice day.

Review.Titre: Bait and Switch
Review.Contenu: Bought my NEAT several years ago with a scanner Model ND 1000.  Signed up for the 15 day trial, but could not get the scanner to install.  Contacted customer support.  Here is what I was told:  If you want help from them you have to upgrade to a plan costing more $, but I would not upgrade until I find if my scanner is compatible with the new utility program.  Their answer was basically "too bad", in order to see if your scanner work, you have to pay more money.  I asked for a supervisor just to be told that they would say the same thing.  Catch-22, just a bait and switch sales pitch

Review.Titre: Are you kidding!
Review.Contenu: Your machines don't work correctly. I had to have a rep from your company stay on the phone with me and he had a hard time of it. I'm returning two machines, because I thought it wasn't strong either to handle my reciepts. Neither worked! Please get the labels to me so I can return them both.

Review.Titre: The billing office service is a scam..
Review.Contenu: In a desperate can't reconcile being back charged for one year of just continue service, I have tried over 11 times to reach the accounting/billing office. There is no way to contact this infamous department. The customer service and technical support teams cannot transfer to these this infamous department as well. All the links on the automated system only lead to a dead end. I am unable to resolve my problem due to no department available in which to speak to, so I declare that the billing office is a scam.

Review.Titre: Horrible company
Review.Contenu: Horrible company. Unable to use software because it wants to avail itself to an unsecured third party storage, (cloud). Legacy system is no longer allowed which was excellent and personal. When purchasing bulk package you are not told of annual software payment. Will not recommend.

Review.Titre: Have left me with a boat anchor scanner…
Review.Contenu: Have left me with a boat anchor scanner that they will not even give me the old software so I can still use it even if it is no longer supported. I had a computer crash and lost my programs and I find out they have switched to a pay by the month or something to use my $350 scanner.

Review.Titre: HORRIBLE!!!
Review.Contenu: I bought the scanner a few years back and had technical support two years ago. I paid $80 and got out of the woods only to find myself there again having used the thing only at tax time to scan receipts!Since there is NO Customer Service phone number, I cannot even take issue with the fact that their product has left me high and dry yet again, unless I am willing to pay again for tech support.I am moving on to another solution as this one is TOO costly and Neat obviously does not care about its clients.Frustrated,Kelly Corsino

Review.Titre: I never received the document I was…
Review.Contenu: I never received the document I was trying to retain therefore I could not do my taxes.I had no clue after purchasing the machine twice I would be charged a monthly fee if so I would not have purchased it. There are too many free apps on the phone and ipad.Neat Receipts Sucks!

Review.Titre: Neat - support is non-existent
Review.Contenu: Try to contact Neat - their system appears designed to prevent you getting through - they "have technical problems".And they don't reply to emails via their website.Does anyone know a good alternative? I've been with Neat for years but they don't seem to care one bit.

Review.Titre: I like the old system
Review.Contenu: I like the old system.  Will continue with it.  I will not use your new system.  Does not fit my tourboat business.   Old one does.  Been with Neat since 2015.  Might have to look around if old system stops working. Thanks. Captain Tom

Review.Titre: Not a happy costomer
Review.Contenu: Neat machine itself is not as it is advertised to be.  It is slow and attimes very confusing on how it works. Support did not help me resolve an error  problem in spite of being on and working with them for more than 3 hours.  When I tried to contact supportback by several  emails to advise that error was still there I got no response. Calling the company for help has you hanging on the phone for extremely long times. I thought I would have this product master very shortly after I receivedit but I must say sadly I do NOT.

Review.Titre: Because in my opinion the sneaking way…
Review.Contenu: Because in my opinion the sneaking way Neat changed software and then offer only 1 time help I will never buy a Neat product again. I am a income tax service with multiple stores and use neat scanners in all. The next time one breaks I will replace with different brand

Review.Titre: I dealt with two different people
Review.Contenu: I dealt with two different people.  Neither gave me a solution to my issue. I have problems with the fact that they are abandoning customers that do not want their information in the Cloud.  I do not want to have to be online every time I want to use my Neat products!

Review.Titre: Neat Scanner Support
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Neat Support plan - NeatCare Essentials Support - for 2 years which includes unlimited phone support. I can get the President of the USA on the phone faster and easier. Neat refuses to publish any phone number, forces you to use email or chat and it's clear they do not want to speak with customers. I'd understand if I hadn't paid for the phone support, but I did, yet its nearly impossible to get to a live, on the phone, technical support agent. Good product - worst service I've come across of any tech company I've encountered. Just terrible.

Review.Titre: WORST CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Review.Contenu: WORST CUSTOMER SUPPORT.   I RECEIVED THE KEY and now I can not get help to installOn their website they post:    " Need to talk to Neat? We hear you! Phone support is now available to ALL Neat software subscribers! 888-898-3253"   --------  This is NOT what it seems.  The number above directs you to their website non-human support.  they force you to open a ticket that then they can take 72 hours to get back to you.  No confirmation, no nothing.Software may be great but company stinks high heavan. This is not a cheap software in comparison to other companies - choose wisely.

Review.Titre: I have a older neat product that I was…
Review.Contenu: I have a older neat product that I was wanting to utilize and you will not give the software to use it without forcing me to do a monthly plan. I cannot afford the monthly plan but was planning on using it later after I found a new position with a company.

Review.Titre: This is Paul , Get something that you don't has to spend more money
Review.Contenu: This is Paul .   I'm Writing a review . My Neat is only One year , But now it don't work.So I called the Company, was hard to contact.They said could fix my problem if , I pay them $199.00 a year.Why should I have to pay more money ?The Lady that I talked to was very Nice. And offer me a discount of $99.29 a year. She said that my software was out date. That I has to update, to get it to work. That's quite silly, for a unit being only one year old !!! . Actually that's highway ROBBERY.I payed good money , you would think that you get something without having to pay more for.

Review.Titre: There is no support
Review.Contenu: There is no support. Is horrible. So inefficient. You can't call or chat or email.  There is no way around it. There is an automatic answering service that when it give you the options for support it simply doesn't answer. Don't use this company.

Review.Titre: They suck
Review.Contenu: They suck. Canceled the service and they kept billing me. Disputed the charges and won the dispute to remove the charges. They still kept billing my card until I finally had to cancel that card and get a new one. I do not recommend this company at all.

Review.Titre: Bait and switch
Review.Contenu: I spent a lot of money  to buy the scanner and then later  they changed the way the software worked to charge an annual fee. It was a big bait and switch. Old software doesn't function so expensive machine useless without annual fee. Not happy!!!!

Review.Titre: You stated the existing users could…
Review.Contenu: You stated the existing users could continue using their Neat scanner without subscribing to the new program.  However, my Neat unit stopped working 3 weeks ago and I have not be able to get it working.  First I was asked to upgrade to the new program, then I received notices stating that I needed to upgrade to v5.7.1.474 but all downloads have been removed from the internet.  I've been using the Neat scanner for my receipts for over 2.5 years and not I cannot access my data.  That's very unprofessional from your company and I would not recommend your product to anyone.  Your support is not acceptable.

Review.Titre: I bought a new PC 2 weeks ago and it…
Review.Contenu: I bought a new PC 2 weeks ago and it has taken this whole time to get my files into the new Neat system. I have spent multiple hours while techs that can hardly speak English, speaking to me from a noisy sweat shop in India. Today I finally got the scanner connected to my computer after 4 hours of remote access. The tech after getting the scanner connected, sent me a helps link and said goodbye. The new system compared to the system I have used for years is terrible with many added steps to the scan process and I’m still trying to figure out how it works. I would not recommend Neat to anyone and I looking for a system to switch too.

Review.Titre: Neat Company has failed to make customers their most important asset.
Review.Contenu: Due to a fall, I was unable to use my Neat device that I bought from the Neat company just a few years before. I spoke to several Neat employees that told me I had to purchase a new Neat device. I tried 1 more time and a female employee told me that she would get another employee to give me instructions on how to continue using my Neat machine through my own system. She, then hung up on me. That kind of behavior is despicable. I tried to make contact with others and had the same kind of results. The Neat Company needs to learn that customers come first. And sometimes extenuating circumstances need to be weighed in.

Review.Titre: waste of time...I am not able to get…
Review.Contenu: waste of time...I am not able to get any help with my older version of NEAT and the online help is useless....regret this purchase.  I cannot even access my old files....wasted too much time on this and the link a service rep sent didn't work.

Review.Titre: I have been abandoned. Be aware, this will happen to you too.
Review.Contenu: I have been a Neat customer from the very early days. I have just upgraded my Mac to El Capitan and my Neat Receipts instantly stopped working. The issue is not with the actual Neat software, but rather with the scanner driver. Today Neat announced, totally out of the blue, that they are not going to be issuing a revised driver for my scanner version. So, now I am faced with having to buy a new scanner. There is nothing wrong with the scanner I have except that Neat wants the revenue stream generated by pushing loyal customers to invest in (unnecessary) new hardware. Caveat emptor. Mark.

Review.Titre: It seems that something happened to my…
Review.Contenu: It seems that something happened to my neat scanner that caused my Dell labtop to no longer work.I then used another computer using Windows 10 Home Edition to set up my Neat Scanner. I signed up for the premium 30 day trial and within that time, the scanner did not scan docujments to the Neat Software nor to the Cloud. Technicians signed onto my computer twice and were unsucceessful. After a week not hearing for them, I puchased an Epson desktop scanner and chalked up a major loss of older importants documents to Neats inabilitgy to find a solution.  Yes I had backup, but that porbably only would work with Neat software.

Review.Titre: I have had two Neato robotic cleaners
Review.Contenu: I have had two Neato robotic cleaners.  The first one lasted less then two years, which was two batteries, then it stopped working.  So, I gave Neato another chance and purchased a second, improved model, this one lasted only a year and a half.  I used only genuine Neato products , have no carpets or pets, cleaned the filter every time they ran and dumped the dust bin at the same time.  On the second Neato the battery, which I ordered and was stated to be a genuine Neato part ,over heated and caused my machine to die completely.  I find it very disappointing, as the machine does a great job, but does not last as long as it should

Review.Titre: I RARLY USE THIS PRODUCT AND NOW I FIND…
Review.Contenu: I RARLY USE THIS PRODUCT AND NOW I FIND OUT IT IS NO LONGER BEING SUPPORTED AND HAVE TO PAY FOR FURTHER SUPPORT.THE DARN SCANNER ALWAYS HAS HAD PROBLEMS . I WILL BE REPLACING THIS NEAT SCANNER ASAP.,AND IT WILL NOT BE WITH ANY NEAT PRODUCT.

Review.Titre: Currently every time I'm using the…
Review.Contenu: Currently every time I'm using the program it shuts down randomly after only being open for about 30 seconds.Also the customer service line was very unhelpful the last time I called. I received conflicting information multiple times.

Review.Titre: After updating the software nothing…
Review.Contenu: After updating the software nothing works. I have tried reinstalling and still nothing works. Upon opening Neat there is an error message. If I try to scan a document in it says paper jam (doesn't attempt to scan at all).

Review.Titre: I feel defrauded by the Neat Company…
Review.Contenu: I feel defrauded by the Neat Company and their misleading practices. I am one of the original neatdesk customers who used the version that has local databases for storing data. Now that Neat has move to cloud storage, their sales agents misled me into believing when I signed up that I would not or have to pay an annual fee to use the software. Now I’m being told I have to renew in order to access my data. Sounds like ransomware to me. I specifically told the agent that I ONLY wanted to scan my data to my laptop hard drive or external drive. Now Neat has control over my data and I must pay to access it. I never ever again recommend this deceitful organization to anyone.

Review.Titre: The Neat application has issues the…
Review.Contenu: The Neat application has issues the company will not diagnose or repair. They refuse to provide technical support. What they call technical support is someone uninstalling and reinstalling the application.  Eventually you will have the same issue and have to uninstall and reinstall the application over and over again. I'm looking for a better scanning tax program. There are many out there. CheersThe response below is made up of false information. I have an error code and log files that were never researched or resolved and still have the same issue. I spoke to what I would call a customer service representative who would not escalate the issue for resolution.

Review.Titre: So disappointed with this neat!
Review.Contenu: So disappointed with this neat!  I have used this product for somewhere around 10 years.  I purchased equipment from NEAT, and now I have to pay for as much as $100/year.  As a self-employed sales person, this is ridiculous!  I'm happy to pay $50 per year, but $8 per month when I use this 10-15 times a year?  No thanks.  By the way, I also bought a new scanner and now I have to update to your new software, so I will have lost $350 that I paid for this machine.  Thanks for nothing, guess I'll head out to find a scanner that let's me scan as much or as little as I choose, withouth you forcing me to join your new program and post my business in the cloud.

Review.Titre: Had it on a different computer and it…
Review.Contenu: Had it on a different computer and it worked ok... now trying to download the drivers on a different computer and it is hell.......Terrible.... just spent hours trying to figure out what to do...

Review.Titre: We have had the Neat for about 2 years
Review.Contenu: We have had the Neat for about 2 years.  It has crashed and you can't even turn it on.  The Neat company does not even support the version that we have, so our only option would be to buy a new one.  No thank you!

Review.Titre: I am very sorry to lose the usefulness…
Review.Contenu: I am very sorry to lose the usefulness of your product. I found it very helpful to scan documents but I do not wish to pay a monthly fee to use it, and it no longer works. So I need to find another way to do the job.

Review.Titre: When I tried to open my Neat scanner
Review.Contenu: When I tried to open my Neat scanner, I found I had to log in.  I do NOT need any access to a cloud function.  All I want to do is scan documents and retain them on my PC.  How can I do that without a subscription?

Review.Titre: An inept company with software that is…
Review.Contenu: An inept company with software that is nonfunctional , poorly developed and very, very hard to communicate with given their site location in the Phillipeans!Use at your own risk and account outcomes!Good luck!

Review.Titre: I have used neat scanners since 2010…
Review.Contenu: I have used neat scanners since 2010 maybe longer. I just bought a new laptop without a cd drive and cannot get the software for my scanner to organize the receipts. They say that they will send you the software for free but then they require you to subscribe to the cloud in order to access it. this was not the agreement I made when I purchased all of their scanners for my business. Very poor customer support for your long term users. you built your business providing software and scanners then switch to monthly subscriptions to milk the customers that get you there.....shame on you!If the rest of us conducted business that way, we would be out of business or facing a lawsuit for bait and switch.

Review.Titre: Company has abandoned long time users…
Review.Contenu: Company has abandoned long time users by dropping support for legacy products.  This is a marketing ploy to force new purchases.  I do not trust this company and would never buy their products again.

Review.Titre: I need information before I buy
Review.Contenu: I need information before I buy.  And the only way to reach u is through email. That doesn’t help me to decide yo buy your services. Before i buy if i have any questions i like to speak to a  live person.

Review.Titre: Your company is garbage
Review.Contenu: Your company is garbage.  I bought a scanner that came with software.  The software no longer works, and now I have to pay for the new version?  That's crap.  I'm never buying your products again.

Review.Titre: Soon there will be a class action  suit…
Review.Contenu: Soon there will be a class action  suit -- In my opinion , still protected  by the Constitution you guys are nothing better than cheap thieves  -- Hopefully the class action will put you out of business

Review.Titre: I am so disappointed with the Neat…
Review.Contenu: I am so disappointed with the Neat Company.  When you sign up for a free trial they require a credit card # be submitted.  At the end of your trial period they automatically sign you up and start charging your credit card.  They don't send an email telling you, you will be charged, they send you an email after the fact.  Then when you call to cancel the subscription  you are questioned why you want to cancel your subscription and after convincing the person their product does not fit my needs and does not seem to integrate with QuickBooks desktop 2020, they cancel your subscription and even though I was one day into the subscription they will still charge me for one month.  I'm sure its in the fine print but please, you should be a little more transparent.

Review.Titre: Via another review from an unhappy…
Review.Contenu: Via another review from an unhappy customer: "Betsy, We do apologize for any frustration or confusion regarding Neat scanners and our newer cloud-based software. You can certainly continue to use your Neat scanner and we provide step by step instructions on how to do that without using the Neat software so you are not required to have a subscription in order to use the scanner. Please see this for details:......... (link not allowed).........We are also on the verge of releasing a free scan utility that will also allow you to use your Neat scanner without any additional cost. We hope you'll be able to take advantage of that when it is released in the very near future."So where is this free scan utility???? Because I haven't found anything.

Review.Titre: DO NOT BUY THESE PRODUCTS!!! THEY DESERT YOU!
Review.Contenu: Well, when I first got my Neat machine I was real happy with it. I copied hundreds of patient files and more. Then, my hard drive crashed and took the program/software with it and was not retrievable. When I contacted Neat, they refuse to help me re-establish the software on my new computer. It's bad enough that I lost all of my files that I shredded after copying them onto my computer that died, but now I have spent a lot of money on a machine that is totally worthless to me now. I will certainly NOT be purchasing another Neat machine given the "service" I have received when I really needed their help. They had NO concern for my needs as well as no mercy whatsoever! I will NEVER buy any of their products again! They do not support their own products after a certain amount of time!

Review.Titre: Support couldn't upload to the Cloud
Review.Contenu: I think you had a great product that I used for many years but if your support staff is unable to upload our documents to the cloud why do you force us to use a product that doesn't work.

Review.Titre: Could not unstand the person
Review.Contenu: Could not unstand the person. It took a while.

Review.Titre: You support was very helpful when I use…
Review.Contenu: You support was very helpful when I use the chat link.I did not like the black screen when I turned over control of my computer so he could find the problem and make the repair.Over the years your changes making versions of your software obsolete has caused me problems enough that I did not use it for quite a while.I'm not thrilled when the support person tried very hard to sell me an upgraded version.

Review.Titre: Migration
Review.Contenu: I would like to comment on Boogie, who did the bulk of the work.  He was very patient and did help me.As for the process of migration,  It was an abysmal failure.  It has taken over one month to complete.  I will check it in the next few days.My view of the cloud app is very poor.  It does not emulate the ease of use of 5.7 and is not user friendly.  It needs a lot of work.  After all the time it took to migrate, I am considering another platform.

Review.Titre: My Tech Dolly was great
Review.Contenu: My Tech Dolly was great.  After she finished I thought all I needed to do was access two documents of instructions one for the scan utility and one for my updated Neat Application.  Not so- going to the site was frustrating-no clear documents to download and or print and two items that looked they might open and be helpful that would not open.  I am going to have to work thru these two new Neat sites on my own.

Review.Titre: Had a great product and screwed it up.
Review.Contenu: You had a GREAT product with Neat Legacy..................then you screwed it all up with your Neat Cloud.  Features are missing...........it is not user-friendly.....................It is difficult to print documents in the right size................you can't combine scans into one file.......They had something great and screwed it up.

Review.Titre: Billed for an account that I didn't have
Review.Contenu: Customer service representative kept repeating the "company's position" which did not answer my question about being billed for an account that I did not think I had and finally she told me that my version of Neat was no longer being supported as Neat was on the Cloud. This is unacceptable to those of us who don't want to leap forward into areas we don't trust.

Review.Titre: bad experience
Review.Contenu: once we said we wanted to try it for a review the sales person lost interest and told us just to go to the website ourselveswe didn't want to sign up for a year for the quick books integration when we aren't even sure the application will do what we need it to dowe were told the integration was non refundable even if we decided not to use the program after the free trial...that seems kind of foolish!!

Review.Titre: Not robust or user friendly
Review.Contenu: Not robust or user friendlyI recently had to upgrade to the cloud version  and it’s fine for saving receipts but not flexible or customizable. When I called I was sent the links to tutorials and told that’s how it worked when I explained what I wanted I was told I didn’t work like that - I was just running reports I had gotten in the old version and using fields in the system

Review.Titre: The rep was very good
Review.Contenu: The rep was very good, unfortunately his hands were tied and couldn't help me with my legacy software. The company turned its back on us customers who started to support the program. BAD NEWS COMPANY. It appears that a lot of people and previous customers are left in the wind. I feel if we knew what direction the company was going, we would have not brought your products

Review.Titre: I was backing up my neat records onto a…
Review.Contenu: I was backing up my neat records onto a thumb drive when I pulled the thumb drive out accidentally. In doing so an error was cased in the software.  I called support but they informed me that my version was not supported anymore.  My only option was to "rent" your current software which I would not do so I kissed my current software and scanner good by.

Review.Titre: Seems like more focus was on getting me…
Review.Contenu: Seems like more focus was on getting me to upgrade and signed up for the cloud service, rather than helping me get reconnected with the software to work my scanner . In the  End it took a second call before I got the email with the link to provide me with the software to install the drivers. And after all that I still could not get My scanner to work.

Review.Titre: Horrible customer care
Review.Contenu: Good grief.  Let Tech take control of my computer and they struggled for a little over 2 hours trying to get my software to work.  Appeared they were multi-tasking with other customers.  I would send a chat and wait and wait and wait for a response.  When they did respond they would send jibberish many times.

Review.Pseudo: Doesn't provide tech support past 30 days.
Review.Titre: CSR that helped LUD
Review.Contenu: CSR that helped LUD, was fine - not happy with the company itself. Forcing customer to go from their desktop scanner to the could is NOT  cool.  There are certain things I may not want employees to be able to access from their homes at anytime if they have their own log on. We were perfectly fine scanning to our server in our business. Now I will no longer refer NEAT to anyone. I have switched to the Epson Scanner with same functionality and lifetime support. I would rather give money to a company that stands by their product rather than NEAT.

Review.Titre: The software is still buggy on Mac
Review.Contenu: The software is still buggy on Mac.  UX is frustrating, App always opens with the full-screen presentation, zooming on documents is terrible, desktop application times out and a hundred other little things.  They need some UX professionals to watch users interact with the software - way too many gotchas....

Review.Titre: My Neat Desktop Scanner
Review.Contenu: My Neat Desktop Scanner quit working so I called for service your service department and they were unable to assist. Nor could they tell me what I should do in order to continue filing all receipts and other items I like to maintain for tax purpose. I admit that at 80 yrs of age I'm not the sharpest tool in the shed in dealing with electronics but neither am I stupid. What can I do about this situation? Please come up with a solution I really need help. Thanking you in advance, I remain F. B. Hanshaw Hernando, FL.

Review.Titre: All they do is tell you to look at a…
Review.Contenu: All they do is tell you to look at a video which has nothing to do with your problem. They promise phone support but don't deliver.Sometimes the app can't find the scanner, sometimes it can but no one can tell me why.The old Neat work well but current upgrades have made it much worse

Review.Titre: Subbpar Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately none of the customer service people knew why once I changed over to the upgrade option the receipts were legible again. I couldn’t imagine why and they couldn’t either. So basically after 2 years of “free” great results, now I was paying for very subpar service and results.

Review.Titre: My Desk Scanner would not scan my…
Review.Contenu: My Desk Scanner would not scan my reciptes. The young man said that the new OS for my MacBook Pro need a new workaround. He said he would send me an email with the fix. I got the email. THEN THE PROBLEMS BEGAIN! I had to go to several files and delete 2 files  I followed as close as I could, but on one step a zip file needed opening. I was instructed to select the driver for my machine. NO LIST OF ANY KIND SHOWED UP. I tried everything but no resutas. Right now my DeskScanner is not working!!!The app that has been sent to me is not working.

Review.Titre: Horrible Phone Support
Review.Contenu: Tried calling in several times for support and the automated attendant had no idea how to route my calls - could not understand me and could not find my Email address or account even though I was a "PAID" support member. Probably the most frustrating phone system that I have ever dealt with.

Review.Titre: I was recently 2000 miles from home and…
Review.Contenu: I was recently 2000 miles from home and my laptop died so I had to reformat and make it all work.. unfortunately I had all my software at home and couldn'tt make the scanner work..  after not luck from neat trying to fine the older version of my software, I was told to download the new version and do the 30 day trial then would have to cancel ..   that's a real PITA..   I was on a long trip and neat let me down !!, I finally got on the windows scanner and made it work..  I desperately needed tax docs scanned and neat let me down.. im not a happy customer..

Review.Titre: I was charged approx
Review.Contenu: I was charged approx. $70 and told my use of a product that i have used or years would be canceled if i did not pay.   In my 10+ years--i purchased the product and when i changed computers, i purchased it again.  Never did i hear about the "service" charge.  i

Review.Titre: Current software is lacking.  Customer Service is rude and unhelpful.
Review.Contenu: Current software lacks the flexibility and useful features of the older software  The format that the reports print out in is far worse.  Customer Service is lacking - the obvious offshore reps can barley speak english and are borderline rude and dishonest.

Review.Titre: The agent I felt was pushy and wouldn't…
Review.Contenu: The agent I felt was pushy and wouldn't let me talk.  I have been using the Legacy Software since Introducing the cloud software that they came out with right after I got my neat scanner.  AND I HATE THE CLOUD SOFTWARE.  As much as both of my scanners cost that should be a standard feature.  I hate how the cloud software logs out all the time and for a company that has unlimited cloud storage already the subscription service is too expensive for rude tech support. The original software, in my opinion, the legacy software version was the best. I dont know why they would do this too it.

Review.Titre: Customer Service needs improving!
Review.Contenu: Your website was nearly impossible to navigate attempting to get specific information!  Then I had to communicate via email that took several days for a response!  Product is good but customer service for purchases/questions needs lots of work!

Review.Titre: Neat Mobile Scanner
Review.Contenu: I have had to have both my USB connector and my scanner replaced, at different times, to solve various problems. I find getting ahold of this company is not easy in the least and I'm bordering on being sorry I purchased this Neat product.

Review.Titre: NEAT Scanner
Review.Contenu: The quality of the scanning really is not that great.  I purchased my NEAT scanner (emphasis on Scanner) about 3 years ago.  I didn't  need to purchase anything for those 3 years and now you have to subscribe to their program every year!  Since I had to replace my scanner because it died I found out from NEAT company that you can use any compatible scanner with there program that you have to purchase anyway.  So I did research and purchased Epson WorkForce ES-500W Wireless Document Scanner for $ 329.99 which is rated 4 stars instead of purchasing another NEAT for $483.90 which is rated 2 star. I really needed a program like Neat and that is the only reason I stay with the program.

Review.Titre: Unstable app/cloud base program
Review.Contenu: I am finding the app more and more unstable. I enter data only to find it missing the next time I check it. The program quits unexpectedly often. When it works, it works great so I am hopeful Neat will work on the weak spots.

Review.Titre: Long-time Neat Legacy User Makes the Switch
Review.Contenu: As a long-time Neat Legacy user, I was frustrated the program had become too unusable to continue its use, so I decided to switch to the Neat Cloud system, even though I do not need -- or want -- the cloud storage. The customer service person was very helpful in making the transition.But once I started actually using the Neat Cloud system, I was not only disappointed at how "buggy" it seems to be (e.g., multiple sign-ins during the day), but also surprized some major features were missing (i.e., combining documents). It also seems much more labor-intensive that the previous version.I'm hoping I'll improve as I get better using the system, and I'm hoping the program is improved quickly.

Review.Titre: 2  Items I use are in development
Review.Contenu: 2  Items I use are in development. Leave option for both versions if not 100% equal.Why I'am I seeing Need Review , I have like all of a sudden 384 . What do i need to get rid of these?

Review.Titre: We use the software about 2 wks every…
Review.Contenu: We use the software about 2 wks every year we had purchased the nest scanner which worked great but is now worthless because the change the software that it will not work with so a waist off money

Review.Titre: I purchased your product thinking I…
Review.Contenu: I purchased your product thinking I would be able to keep it in use. Know you want more money if I want to use it. Not fair. I payed the price you had set. I should be able to use my scanner.

Review.Titre: i use to give it 5 stars but now very upset
Review.Contenu: i use to give it 5 stars. but when i had to purch a new computer i am not able to download the neat 5  software i had that allowed me to scan documents of my clients to their files (pdfs) i don't need cloud storage and i didn't really even use their expense part of software... i utilize my scanner to scan documents to send to clients for signature and other important stuff and now my scanner is useless.. i corresponded with email twice since you cant talk to a real person on phone. and they just claimed they retired my version of software and couldn't help me i would have to pay ... i would rather purch a whole new system then give them another penny for what ive already paid for . actually twice since i have both desktop and the handscanner.  if anyone knows where i can get a copy of software please help!!!!!!

Review.Titre: Tech support is the worst
Review.Contenu: I have 3 of the desk scanners, and for the most part, I like the scanners but there are several glaring problems.  One, if you ever need tech support it takes forever and rarely are the problems fixed. Two, I have been on the phone for hours on single problems, and they always blame some thing else, like it is your adobe app or something else, even when you explain that everything else works perfectly with it.  Three, when they say they have finally fixed a problem, they send you an email and say if it is reoccurring to send them an email and then you will be able to bypass everyone and go to them, problem is they never respond and you have to start all over.  I have a problem where I scan in a document, then enter all the information and a few minutes later all the information is gone and you have to re enter it.

Review.Titre: Disappointed
Review.Contenu: I received a letter that indicated I owed Neat money for a product I stopped using more than a year ago.  I explained this to the person I called and three times I had to reiterate that I received a letter and not an email.  An email may very well have been sent, however I am not aware of that.  In short I think your product falls short in many areas especially since you went from desktop to SaaS.  Your Saas version does not have the same scanning and reporting abilities that I was accustom to in the desktop version I had been using for more than 10 years. While I'm interested in your SaaS I fear the same minds that created the original desktop versions are still creating the SaaS version as I can see the signs such as week reporting, no scanning directly from the SaaS.  You asked for an honest review and I have provided it, now it's up to Neat to do something about it.

Review.Titre: Nice enough tech, but where my software?
Review.Contenu: Nice enough tech, but the software for my scanner has been discontinued.  INSTEAD, I was invited to purchase an annual license (aka annuity).  Meh!!

Review.Titre: One of the problems with Neat is that…
Review.Contenu: One of the problems with Neat is that they retired their legacy 5.1 softwareand ND 1000 desktop scanner, but said that customers could continue using this if they downloaded the 5.4 software which is listed on Neat website.  However when you go to this website it DOES NOT APPEAR.  After talking to Neat in the Philippines they advised that link is NO LONGER AVAILABLE EVEN THOUGH IT APPEARS ON NEAT WEB SITE.  NOT GOOD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Going offshore to the Philippines may have saved Neat money, but for the customer it is not efficient.  For example I called the Philipines gave them my question a polite person said please hold, 10 minutes later somone else picked up and I had to explain the problem again. this person said please hold, another 10 minutes, guess what a new rep. got on had to repeat again.  Bottom line they could not answer & just were trying to sell me the Premuim edition of Neat.

Review.Titre: Support did not correct the problem
Review.Contenu: Support did not correct the problem. Reinstalled NEAT software will not run, and the company will no longer support the product.

Review.Titre: While customer service was helpful.
Review.Contenu: While customer service was helpful.I have not received the refund that was suppose to be put back into my account.

Review.Titre: Should be able to use a piece of…
Review.Contenu: Should be able to use a piece of equipment you purchased without having to pay a monthly fee.

Review.Titre: Don't use NEAT for currency conversion
Review.Contenu: Don't use NEAT for currency conversion. I payed 2.3% additional fee.

Review.Titre: You don't give the customers the…
Review.Contenu: All internet based is putting all your eggs in one basket, and bad for the consumer when an internet connection is NOT available holding us hostage.You don't give the customers the features we use to have and don't know what you're doing.Tech is not familiar enough with Fujtisu scanner features. It's all internet based? Still confused. If the internet goes down, then how do I access my info? You're holding me hostage with my private information!!! Not acceptable.I have crappy very slow internet and down a lot, so if I don't have the info on my hard drive, again, I have no access. I have been late and penalized on my taxes because of no access to my information. Now you want to go all internet. Who is this easier for? You or me?  YOU, of course, not the customer who's paying you, especially when you create the problems in the first place with awful IT guys.You've taken all 14+ years off my hard drive, more times than I can count with your software, and then I have to call you back to import it again. What's wrong with you? You are upsetting my lifestyle taking hours to correct a problem YOU created and have nothing to support me and any IRS inquiries when you take my info away from me.Now I'm being told you won't support the Smart Organization System, yet FujIstu has the option in the software to save to the COMPUTER. Isn't that contradictory? You don't know what you're doing. PERIOD!

Review.Titre: Extremely Unhappy
Review.Contenu: I honestly feel that this Neat Cloud system lacks the software to support and function with Apple products.  I have spoken with over 15 reps since I’ve purchased this product and every time it’s a stressful and annoying process.  First of all the third party call center you work with is very frustrating trying to communicate with them or understand their pronunciations on English words.  the constant lack of communication amongst staff, and the fact that you ask all these security questions and contact numbers , but yet I was disconnected by agents more than 4 times and promised a callback which didn’t happen.  Each time having to explain my issue and having agents ask random questions with no explanation of source or step actions to find material they require.  This product is the best paper weight I’ve ever purchased as far as I’m concerned , just don’t ask me about the product. Itself , the call center, customer support , or if I would recommend that someone go through the mess I’m dealing with .  It’s like you expect me to spend 3 whole days working on issue, tell me that the backup or transfer of files will last 5 hours and ask me for a callback the next day once it completes, but on 3 different attempts it fails , or rejects and when I give you the rejection code your so called senior agents don’t know or have never seen these error codes.  I honestly don’t know what else to do, and calling you all for help or assistance is bad for my health as your support team is honestly not trained properly.

Review.Titre: I think it's to buy your product than…
Review.Contenu: I think it's to buy your product than pay for update each year,

Review.Titre: I still have the same problems  can't…
Review.Contenu: I still have the same problems  can't get it fixed

Review.Titre: I called Customer Service because I had…
Review.Contenu: I called Customer Service because I had a hard drive failure and lost the Neat program.  I knew the Legacy software I had used for years wasn't supported now, and I needed to know which of the subscription programs best suited my small company needs.  I chose to 'chat' with a Customer Service rep and let them guide me and decide which level of service I needed.  I initially provided a little background about my company and poised the question to the Customer Service rep:  Which level of Neat would be best for me.The rep ignored my question and began telling me the difference between the monthly rate and the annual rate of the premium level and no matter what I said, all the rep could do was quote me the prices and tell me how much I would save by getting the Premium level and pay the annual rate.  I hung up in disgust and bought the 'Lite' level of service and the rep called me and started again with babble about the annual versus monthly rate for the Premium program.  I told him I wasn't interested and hanged up.  The next day he called me again and said he was ready to 'finish the transaction'.  I told him to never call me again.  I did have an issue getting the 'scan' button to work for me and I reluctantly called Neat Technical Support.  The dear lady who (almost immediately) answered my call was very helpful and got me going in just a few minutes.  That's not the interaction I'm being asked to rate here but I added one star because she was knowledgeable and helpful.  HOWEVER, there was a party going on in the background:  People laughing and chatting about this and that, background noise unrelated to technical support, and the lady helping me was distracted several times by, I assume, someone speaking to her while she was trying to help me.  So to use just one word to describe Neat Customer Support, that word is UNPROFESSIONAL.

Review.Titre: Hard to talk to support.
I CANNOT MAKE IT WORK!!!
If I had it to do over I would NEVER have bought this!
Review.Contenu: I use for home office use. I have owned the scanner for approximately two years. I have lost years off my life on excruciating long waits for chat, email AND phone support. I have had repeated issues over the two years. I had some of the same issues as other users.  Here are the highlights1. Difficult to understand how to operate initially although eventually I figured out the basics but none of the more advanced features.2. Scanner that came with purchase package did not work. Replaced under warranty. Wasted one week waiting on exchange.2. Poor job of scanning photo business cards or promo cards. Even though the TV ads show that it is designed to scan business cards.3. Slow to PROCESS scanned documents, receipts, etc.4. Frequently selects wrong amount for sales tax on receipts.5. Must review every document input to verify correctness.6. Frequently have to re-scan because of lack of clarity on some of pages scanned especially for mult-page documents..7.Once scans are in folder, if you have ANY problems (which I have TWICE) and have to reinstall, all of the folders are gone. The scans can be recovered but what good is that when two years of scans are all jumbled up? I can do better with a shoebox!8. Customer "service" is a joke. They try to hide from helping you behind online FAQs only. UNLESS you pay for a service contract. (Which I object to since it has been a plethora of continual problems from the start) I spent over $400 bucks on this machine and expect it to work. I expect better for a product that has only ONE function! 9. I have been trying to get email "help" since January 26. Today is April 1 (this review is not a joke) and I STILL do not have my issue fixed. I have been unable to use my scanner since January 26. It takes 3-5 days to get an email response. This is the worst customer experience! Don't they know that consumer's number one reason to shop elsewhere is lack of service AND inability to get a phone number to TALK to someone? I guess since they have the only product of it's kind they can be smug about their crappy service but as soon as that patent is up and other players enter the field, I am DONE with them! UPDATE 4/1/2015 I FINALLY was escalated to a senior technician named Genine. She was a GENIUS and unraveled ALL of my issues with one screen share. Can't the company see that the favorable impression that occurred in that ONE session could have been done from the start and avoided three months of seething frustration???

Review.Titre: Last two times I scanned items when I…
Review.Contenu: Last two times I scanned items when I tried to edit and file them the screens are blank< before this everything worked pretty well. I've been using NEAT force number of years ever since the records were keep on your own computer, that was my favorite version. It always worked.

Review.Titre: I aunable to edit/file records
Review.Contenu: I a. Still having trouble gettin to edit/file records I scand into neat yesterday. I did get some info over chat but the problem is NOT resolved.

Review.Titre: Exporting Data from Neat
Review.Contenu: I had a constructive interaction with LizA who gave me pointers on downloading my Neat file cabinet. I think the product would be better if within the current web system there was an easy way to port data stored in Neat to a computer or other storage that does not require an annual subscription. Neat is useful whilst a company is active but a solution needs to be available other than the use of unsupported legacy software to help with mandatory storage after business closure.

Review.Titre: Liza ultimately fixed my main problem…
Review.Contenu: Liza ultimately fixed my main problem of getting Neat to work with my ScanSnap, and I am grateful. However I spent at least two hours not counting the time I tried the Chat and there would be 5 minutes between replies. It was disjointed and stressful. I want a person who can give and take not the process of a Chat communication. It was frustrating.

Review.Titre: While Liza did a good job and tried her…
Review.Contenu: While Liza did a good job and tried her best, I'm sure, the process took too long over 2 days with no resolution. On the 3rd day still no fix though it seems to be a communication problem between QB and the neat program. Overall pleased with Neat and would usually give a higher rating except for this issue.

Review.Titre: Don't blame my tech
Review.Contenu: Don't blame my tech.  She was 5 Star all the way. she solved my reason for calling to my satisfaction. She also asked if I had any other problems so I told her about a print issue no tech has ever solved well that failed same as always.  In my estimation she deserves an additional 5 stars for trying.

Review.Titre: Not informing customer of potential problem
Review.Contenu: When I called Neat "Support" and waiting for someone to answer I waited over 25 minutes listening to a recording that said I was # 1 in the queue. After I was able to talk to a person they told me they were sorry and they were short-handed. I finally found out that the new MAC upgrade to Ventura was not able to use my NEAT scanner. The MAC Ventura upgrade was in use over a month ago. WHY DIDN'T YOU PUT OUT A NOTICE TO YOUR USERS AND TELL THEM IF THEY UPGRADED THEY WOULD NOT BE ABLE TO SCAN THEIR DOCUMENTS??? IT'S CALLED CUSTOMER SERVICE! I AM A LONG-TIME CUSTOMER AND I EXPECT BETTER.

Review.Titre: Over a month to upload files to the cloud
Review.Contenu: Over a month to upload files to the cloud is a bit much. Especially when you have to sit at your computer while tech’s perform their duties. Need to have a better way to transfer files to the cloud. I have a business and other responsibilities that don’t allow me to take this type of time. Tech support was very polite and seem to try and do their best. Had to request escalation of the problem before it got resolved. Once resolved everything works fine with the application. New customers should be told up front that the process may take this long.

Review.Titre: The tech knew what he was doing
Review.Contenu: The tech knew what he was doing, but didn't convey the relevant information.  I had to reinstall windows and didn't know I had to reinstall the drivers. He had me do a screen share and corrected the problem, but didn't tell me what he did.  I only know because I was watching. I would like to download the drivers in case I ever have to do this again, but he didn't tell me where they are.

Review.Titre: It took forever to figure out that the…
Review.Contenu: It took forever to figure out that the only problem was that I was missing the scan driver.  Rowell was very patient with me, however, and I appreciate his being willing to show me how to manage between the scan screen and the cloud.The previous version had the scan and the files all on one screen.  I feel that having to open two different things to scan and file is a bit bulky and should be put back into one site.

Review.Titre: I recently had an issue with nest…
Review.Contenu: I recently had an issue with nest receipt.   I am using legacy software.   They would not even talk to me until I purchased a subcription so i had to purchase a gull year upfront.  The fix was relatively easy once they started their support.  They resolved my issue and the support tech was super helpful.  I feel the policy of only helping subscription customers is a little challenging especially since I've been using desktop neat receipt for over 7 years without an issue.

Review.Titre: I was looking for a driver that would…
Review.Contenu: I was looking for a driver that would allow me to use a different scanner on their Nest program.  She did not give me the information I was looking for.  She did give me a link to the manufacturer of my scanner but it was of no use. I will no longer be using their software.

Review.Titre: Cloud Version Lacks Mass Export Functionality
Review.Contenu: I have been using NEAT software for scanning receipts since it was just a desktop application,  I switched over to the cloud-based version last year.  It's been handy and useful, but I was very disappointed to learn that from the cloud based version, I cannot do a bulk export of data to a csv file or any other way  I have hundreds of receipts filed, and I need to export them so they can be summarized easily for tax purposes.  Without that function, I am limited to viewing my receipts online or exporting them in increments of 100, which is a lot more work.

Review.Titre: Victor was really good
Review.Contenu: Victor was really good. It's the software I have trouble with. Bugs seem to pop up often with the software and it is time consuming to repetitively call tech support. That's why I am happy to be on the User Review group to help influence future software development. I've been using this for years and have invested a LOT of time in it. It needs to work, whether Mac or PC. I am a Mac user. Thank you.

Review.Titre: My Neat
Review.Contenu: I love my Neat, being able to scan multiple docs and store directly, and do NOT like that it is now internet/cloud based. Customer service is through e-chat. I just want to save my stuff to my computer, and not involve an outside entity. It also is expensive to have cloud access (that I don't want), and must be purchased for a year.
