Review.Titre: Software does not combine files, and other issues
Review.Contenu: Software does not combine files. It will not show a full screen image without downloading. Also, thanks to the tech who assisted me, I was able to find a work around to save a business card to my contacts file; however, the software should have worked.This image was good in the preview and would only save 2/3's of the image upon saving. Still more work to be done, before 5 stars can be given.

Review.Titre: While I was greatful the agent helped…the sales pitches are annoying
Review.Contenu: While I was greatful the agent helped me repair my issue quickly,I am disturbed that every time I call for assistance they try to “sell” me an upgraded yearly package. I don’t need anymore services that I subscribe to.im not a business and don’t use quick books. And after telling tje agents this,they STILL try and upgrade me. If I say it once,I wish they’d let it go.

Review.Titre: Spent over 5 hours on a chat with tech…
Review.Contenu: Spent over 5 hours on a chat with tech support. The tech agent kept leaving me to spend time on other chat sessions. Waited as long as 45 minutes for him to return to me to continue helping with my issue. That was totally unsatisfactory even though he did finally solve my issue. The agents should deal with just one customer at a time. My issue should have been solved in no more than a couple of hours, not five.

Review.Titre: Was happy that this man only took a few…
Review.Contenu: Was happy that this man only took a few minutes to fix what I had called in for two months ago. At that time I was on the phone for several hours that was the reason I hesitated to call back to have it fixed still don’t know how to use the scanner they make it very complicated and I have a degree in computer applications graduated the Top of my class!

Review.Titre: software
Review.Contenu: liza was wonderful and very helpfulthe new software is hard to work with and more time consuming than old 5.7 program  i do not recommend it for anyone who is in a hurry or just wants a simple file cabinet to store reciepts.

Review.Titre: Once Per Use Crash
Review.Contenu: I have been a Neat user since the beginning. I fought hard against the move to the cloud. While I do appreciate the cloud now, I don't know if I have found a much more buggy software than Neat. It seems to have some counter that makes it crash at least once per use for no apparent reason. Why a program that simply does a process that copiers have done for 40 years cannot operate without a crash per incident is beyond me.

Review.Titre: Unhelpful tech support
Review.Contenu: They were unable to resolve my issue and were totally unconcerned.  The person actually terminated the chat session after telling me that the only solution was to pay a lot of money for an annual subscription.  All I want to do is open my old data on a new computer.  I do not need cloud storage or any of the other features in their new subscription plan.

Review.Titre: I was told you no longer sale scanners…
Review.Contenu: I was told you no longer sale scanners and that I would have to buy a new one.  I don't know why I even need neat as I don't use any of the neat software....I only scan to my personal computer.  If the scanner gets to where I can't read the documents, I will purchase another one that doesn't need me to pay for the privilege of using it.

Review.Titre: Your NEAT DESK Scanners Unreliable
Review.Contenu: Your NEAT DESK Scanners are not very reliable. I have had to return two of them recently because they do not do the job. The documents get stuck in them part way through. It's a common fault. Someone was supposed to send me instructions on how to use my smartphone to scan documents. I have not yet received that. That was over two weeks ago.

Review.Titre: repetitive problem with "no scanner…
Review.Contenu: repetitive problem with "no scanner connected" when signing onto NEAT.  This is a NEAT problem and has been going on for 18 months.  About time to fix it at NEAT's end so calls not needed to fix problem.  In legacy, NEAT did all the cropping automatically, so cloud can take twice as long unless documents are 8.5"x11"

Review.Titre: Neat Software Udapte
Review.Contenu: I could not access my Neat software after updating my Mac to High Sierra.  Kevin Jan D was able to reinstall another version of Neat successfully.  My ongoing problem is now the daily phone calls/hang-ups from Neat.  When I answer the call, the caller hangs up on me.  I cancelled my automatic renewal of my software before Kevin resolved my main issue.  I planned to reinstate my renewal, but If the calls continue I will not renew and will file a complaint with the BBB.

Review.Titre: The person I spoke with was hard to…
Review.Contenu: The person I spoke with was hard to understand and I don't believe they were very educated on your product.  I asked several questions and they didn't seem to understand what I was asking.  Language barrier was very frustrating!

Review.Titre: My email that my original account was…
Review.Contenu: My email that my original account was under, became no longer available, so I established a new email. It took from sometime in February until yesterday to get all my documents over to a new account with my new email. That was much too, too much time and required my computer to be tied up for most of each day.

Review.Titre: not with the money
Review.Contenu: The device does not work with my tablet.  It did not work immediately with my laptop- I had to get assistance- although the techs I talked to were pleasant and helpful.  When it did work for me, it was slow to scan, and slow for the software to read it.  I stopped using it and am photographing my documents and creating my own filing system via my own cloud hard drive.  It was a waste of money for me.

Review.Titre: Backup process is tedious.
Review.Contenu: When scanning and editing documents the back up gets confused and does not keep up with the changes made. When editing a new document the backup process is running and either drops the title to the document or creates a second copy. The backup does not keep up with the changes made. So you have to turn off back up. Do all the scanning and editing and then turn it back on and wait till the backup completes.

Review.Titre: Jolyn works hard
Review.Contenu: Jolyn works hard, yet this process has been very challenging. She needed a preparation check list or something from Neat to help her let the client know how much time and hard drive it takes. It took weeks. I think there has to be a better way to prepare your clients and to explain the length of time it takes to get this done. I had no idea how much hard drive it would take up or the hours it would take. I couldn't just sit by the computer and wait for days. I loved the old system, not crazy about having to learn a new one.

Review.Titre: Disappointed
Review.Contenu: My parts order went fine however that didn't fix my ND-1000 issue and you have no repair facilities. Paying $79.00 for tech service that doesn't mean they can fix it either so what is a person to do. Your company wouldn't even answer a letter I wrote. Guess home users are not as important as business folks

Review.Titre: Neat is fine, and could be so much better.
Review.Contenu: Neat is fine. I preferred many of the functions of their old software, but the constant crashing was a major issue. The new software is basically the same, but with a less intuitive GUI, less features and functions, slower to load, and no ability to edit (that I've found) multiple items as a group. Unless you're working on a 27" screen or bigger, the scanned receipts are too small to read without zooming all the way in, which is slow. Neat's basic and fine, but could be so much better.

Review.Titre: I have used Neat Receipts for about 5…
Review.Contenu: I have used Neat Receipts for about 5 years now and they old desktop version is ALOT better than there cloud.  I don't understand why you can't have it so we can customize it so it will work for us.  Such as be able to add our own fields and customize our reports the way we want it.

Review.Titre: The customer service was great
Review.Contenu: The customer service was great!  ... But the box states clearly the software and scanner work with Intuit QuickBooks. There is no additional cost IF you use the mobile version QuickBooks. If you don't, there is a monthly charge to have it work with the desktop version. I had hoped to plug it in to my computer like any scanner and have it directly input to my desktop QuickBooks. I feel misled. An ongoing subscription price difference sounds different than the 'includes neat premium bundle' printed on the box.

Review.Titre: Overall, good concept. It all works consistently 70% of the time.
Review.Contenu: Customer service is great. The client software is buggy as Hell. Always has been, despite numerous revisions. The Desktop Scanner needs adjustment quite frequently, despite some instructions on accomplishing that. Such examples are paper feed issues, customizing dark or light preferences, disparities between online and offline versions of scanned data, etc. Would be nice to have a service center to do routine maintenance for a very reasonable fee. Otherwise, digitizing my paper world is awesome. I'm very happy with my decision to do that.

Review.Titre: The customer service was fine
Review.Contenu: The customer service was fine. My problem is with the loss of a MAJOR function with our "upgrade".I find it hard to believe that an "upgrade" actually takes away a MAJOR time saving function. That function being, the ability to print from email to NEAT. The fact of the matter is this "upgrade" is going to cost more money in administrative wages by taking the time, not to mention printer ink, to actually have print out the email documents, then rescan them into the NEAT system. I'm not happy Thanks Paul Fisher

Review.Titre: Average availability
Review.Contenu: Whenever I scan a number of documents, my scanner locks up on me and I have to close everything down. If you can explain why this happens, I would greatly appreciate it. I have been using NEAT for a number of years and since I upgraded to NC1000 I have had more problems.

Review.Titre: Decent customer service
Review.Contenu: Decent customer service.  Some confusion over offer I had been given and whether I was actually eligible.  They ended up making the offer and I accepted.  Then some confusion how it could be activated.  In the end, with some effort, it did all work out for the best.

Review.Titre: Not all that happy
Review.Contenu: The transition to a subscription based system when a user like myself who previously only wanted to scan to his computer is obnoxious and quite sneaky.  There should have been an option to grandfather in prior users who could avoid the subscription rip off if they did not need cloud services.Your support people are helpful but the need to communicate by email wastes too much time.  A phone call could resolve the issue I had in about 5 minutes.  Instead back and forth emails wasted 2 days and too much time.I am not happy with your company and I gave you 3 stars just to be nice!.

Review.Titre: Used to love
Review.Contenu: Love the program, but was extremely dissatisfied with the fact that because i lost my original program disk, i am now forced to use the online program.  I do not trust the cloud and i do not understand why i have to now pay monthly for the same service i had already purchased at a premium price when i initially purchased my NeatOffice. If i knew this ws going to happen,  i would not have shelled-out the almost $1k to begin with. I give 3 stars becuase program is great, but i would give negative 3 stars for their lack of assistance in us longtime customers and gouging us for more money.

Review.Titre: Good but not Great
Review.Contenu: The scanner works well most of the time.  It doesn't always scan the information correctly.  I didn't like the chat option for help - getting someone on the phone works best.  It is nice to be able to email what has been scanned.  Also it's easy to find things.

Review.Titre: The problem I called to address was I renewed my Neat account that had an old email address. I was transferred to an agent to make the changes necessary to access my files using my new email address.
Review.Contenu: The problem I called to address was resolved, but the process took longer than I deemed a trained/ experienced service agent should have taken. Either the individual was new or they were handling more than one case note during our interaction.

Review.Titre: i prefer the original software to the cloud software.
Review.Contenu: It was difficult to explain what I was trying to do to the support individual. I am still struggling with the cloud version of Neat in terms of functionality, searching, stability, availability versus the original version. I liked my original better.

Review.Titre: scan worked well until i was forced to…
Review.Contenu: scan worked well until i was forced to upgrade to cloud service.  then in effort fo charge me for what i had already purchased the software would not work at all.  spent quite a long time with support in order to get back in service.

Review.Titre: Updates and Improvements Needed
Review.Contenu: I feel the software form, fit and function needs to be updated after so many years. The text recognition needs to be improved. Lastly, the Neat Verify must be checked for correctness. You can't assume they've done it right.

Review.Titre: I am not happy with the way they change…
Review.Contenu: I am not happy with the way they change software to be web based only.I also would like to have entire folders on a  my own thumb drive but told that I could not backup entire cabinet  on a thumb drive like I did in the past.

Review.Titre: Moderately user friendly.
Review.Contenu: A lot more though needs to go into simplifying the interface and making it much more intuitive.  It's a great product, but needs much more effort on the user end experience than on the technology side at this point.

Review.Titre: $6 a month for ?
Review.Contenu: I contacted Neat to find out what I am receiving for the monthly payment of $6-instead of getting a call or an explanation I was directed to a web site. I would definitely prefer a more personal interaction.

Review.Titre: review of the Neat
Review.Contenu: For the most part, the desktop version scans very well and moves items to the computer well.  There are times, however when I am scanning items to several folders and when I move to the next folder, it shifts the folder to be a sub folder of the one I scanned the previous document to.  The mobile app could be more user friendly for finding items and for scanning items back to the cloud and the desktop.  The product has been good for scanning and filing bills and for scanning and forwarding items as attachments with emails.  I seem to need to store the scanned item to my desktop documents and then use the document to attach to my email.  That seems like an added step and does get a little cumbersome..

Review.Titre: Complaint
Review.Contenu: The. NEw program is very difficult for older people. The 5.4 was very easy. This program is ridiculous! Claire was the person that helped me and she is remarkable. Very patient and very helpful!

Review.Titre: I had to wait several days for a cable…
Review.Contenu: I had to wait several days for a cable to arrive from Neat & then played phone tag for a few days with the Neat Rep.  When we finally got together, he was able to satisfactorily solve the issues.

Review.Titre: it keeps throwing me out   also the…
Review.Contenu: it keeps throwing me out   also the headings in different categories don't fit what i am saving i wish i could enter the headings myself   also not able to save to a external drive

Review.Titre: Disappointment
Review.Contenu: I'm not happy with the direction the company has gone. The new cloud based model with monthly or annual subscription fees is a slap in the face for longtime personal users.

Review.Titre: I feel like the representative was not…
Review.Contenu: I feel like the representative was not really "on top of it" in terms of understanding the problems and the solutions.  At one point, it appeared that she had to seek help from someone else, and I overheard the conversation in a foreign language, but with no explanation of what was happening.  Eventually everything was worked out, but it took an inordinate amount of time and, in some cases, I had to repeat several times what my problems were before they were understood.  Also, on Friday, she wouldn't connect to my computer to solve the problem but had to re-schedule for several days later (after the Memorial Day weekend).  The call was about 15 - 20 minutes late, with no email saying there would be a delay.  I often had a hard time understanding the representative.  Overall, the experience was inferior to other support sites that I have used.

Review.Titre: My experience with the representative…
Review.Contenu: My experience with the representative was fine. It’s the software that I have issues with for the Mac and OS for mobile devices that I’m not happy with. In my opinion the software should work seemlessly together between the iPhone, the iPad and the desktop software with the cloud system and in real time. They also should have the same exact features across all platforms. If you want to be a leader in the industry then you have to get it together. It’s a great concept but needs some fine tuning.  Also I would like to see the same level of dedication to the Mac and it’s mobile devices as to the PC.  I would also like to speak to an American vs a foreign speaking person with a difficult accent to understand. Also would like to spend the time speaking to the agent during the troubleshooting process instead of chtting with the agent in a chat room. The experience is a lot different.

Review.Titre: Due to the company's change in mission…
Review.Contenu: Due to the company's change in mission (no longer servicing or selling hardware) I don't have the experience with necessary to rate them.

Review.Titre: NEAT Initial Review
Review.Contenu: I use for home only. My initial impression follows:1. Difficult to understand how to operate initially.. Took over two hours to get correctly installed because of faulty software and only through help of NEAT technicians by purchasing $49.00 two year customer assistance plan. Outstanding customer service once plan was purchased.2. Scanner that came with purchase package did not work. Replaced under warranty. Wasted one week waiting on exchange.2. Much redundancy to Quicken.3. Slow, slow, slow to PROCESS scanned documents, receipts, etc.4. Frequently selects wrong amount for sales tax on receipts.5. Must review every document input to verify correctness.6. Frequently have to re-scan because of lack of clarity on some of pages scanned especially for mult-page documents..7.Requirement to set "combined or separate" documents and "one-sided versus two sided" documents is often forgotten which then requires re-scanning.

Review.Titre: Great system for new user, terrible if transferring from Legacy
Review.Contenu: I had the original Neat system, and was very disappointed when they went from that system to the current system.However due to the poor image quality from the original software I finally bought a subscription of the system they currently have.I tried the system out on a trial basis first and the quality was 100 times better and filled in more info.So after spending $300+ for a year subscription, I was told to contact support to transfer my files from the Legacy version to the cloud.They started the process and I had 22,000 files worth a total of under 2GB of data.After over 2 weeks with my computer on 24/7 I am not even at 50% of upload. My speed is 14 MBPS upload, so it should be completed, yet they keep saying it depends on so many things.I am very disappointed that it take this long to transfer the files with no end in site. I really do not need the online storage, as I back up my data multiple ways, yet the fact that Microsoft no longer supports the old software if I need to transfer in the future I would lose all my data.

Review.Titre: Company  support…
Review.Contenu: Company is very reluctant to support their legacy products mandating online subscription Therefore not very supportive of legacy customers

Review.Titre: My Response to Neats Response to my 1st email
Review.Contenu: The Representative that helped over the phone was great. I appreciate that he helped me resolve the issue I had but I am NOT happy that all of your services are for Cloud Customers Only. That is not fare to all of the clients that have your product and want to continue business with Neat that don’t want or use the cloud. Neat should support ALL aspects and issues that clients have with Neat products. Support All or you will continue losing more loyal clients.Your Response was these are some options and this is what is states in the link you attached to your response “Please keep in mind that the retired desktop software is not supported and the installation link for these versions are no longer available. We cannot guarantee the integrity of your data if you choose to continue to use a retired version of Neat.”What? No guarantee to the integrity of your Data if you use non cloud desk top “Retired” version?!!! That’s bull - - - - Support All aspects or you will lose loyalty.

Review.Pseudo: J R Williams (J&J Racing) Transfer Flow Customer
Review.Titre: First of all the new program takes…
Review.Contenu: First of all the new program takes longer to use than the old one. Secondly, I was never informed that my old program would quit loading to the cloud at the end of November. Then, when I finally contacted you the technician who was a very nice man, downloaded the new program to my desktop and laptop, but we lost all of my downloads from Nov. 30th until now. Then, the program had issues that another tech worked on. He resolved the main issue, but in doing so the scanner quit working. He began working on that and then left at the end of his shift without telling me he was leaving. Ten minutes later I contacted your service again and another friendly representative got my scanner working again but I am still having issues and will have to make arrangement to connect with a senior technician. I wasted nine hours today just trying to get your program working and I'm still not sure it will work and if it does it seems to be much slower than the program it is replacing. I am sorry I ever came on board to many years ago.

Review.Titre: I love the product that Neat Receipts…
Review.Contenu: I love the product that Neat Receipts offers, but when I need help it seems very problematic to get resolutions to my problem.

Review.Titre: Long time customers are forced to use…
Review.Contenu: Long time customers are forced to use their cloud bases system, for a fee, after purchasing the original product. No support.

Review.Titre: Good product but software very slow
Review.Contenu: I like the way Neat organizes receipts, but both the scanner and the software are very slow, even using a very fast computer.

Review.Titre: The Tech support person was well informed but...
Review.Contenu: The support tech was well informed and did a great job. My problem is with neat company itself. They have abandoned everyone who has purchased their scanner. Neat company is no longer producing or updating the software necessary to operate the scanner. They are instead going for the big money and forcing it's customers to subscribe to their online cloud services!! Tragic mistake! I have thrown my scanner in the trash since it is now completely useless. I spent good money for my ND-1000 and I can no longer use it. What a horrible company!!! To assume that every user wants to join a pay per month cloud service to scan receipts and automatically send them into QuickBooks or some other program is just plain defective thinking! I am a realtor and I need a doc scanner to convert paper into PDF files... as do many others I have spoken with about this crazy move!!!  Good luck, but I am outta here! Done with Neat and their money scam cloud BS!!! Why on earth would anyone want to pay another $10 a month for the rest of their lives on top of the already pricey original purchase of the scanner!!??? Someone needs to be fired at neat!!!

Review.Titre: Lots of settings needed before  it…
Review.Contenu: Lots of settings needed before  it becomes great to have tool.Otherwise great customer service

Review.Titre: I found it difficult to understand the…
Review.Contenu: I found it difficult to understand the person due to heavy accent; he was polite and helpful.

Review.Titre: Neat's customer service has forgotten…
Review.Contenu: Neat's customer service has forgotten the benefit of actually talking to a customer.

Review.Titre: Like Neat but needs some extra work!
Review.Contenu: I tried to post suggestions and ideas with in neat program but it wants to change my password before proceeding! I have used neat for several decades and love the simplicity of scanning my receipts to set up for reports during tax season. I have some issues with your recent upgrades. Your orange colored platform was fabulous. It was a one click type deal and you could scan your receipts, edit and send to your folders. Now with this blue utility thing we have to click on the icon, scan doc, open browser, sign into neat, edit doc, then send to folder! In your attempt to make upgrade feature you’ve inadvertently created MANY more step for us to use the software. A quick solution to this, and one I’m surprised you haven’t thought of yet, is to simply add a neat cloud link to the blue scan utility. That will reduce those extra unnecessary steps you’ve created for us.Lastly, your neat books service nice as it is and possibly a decent competition to quick books is WAY TOO EXPENSIVE at almost $500/year! You need to come down significantly on this service if expect us customers to purchase that service and expand your customer base. A nice sweet spot for this program is an annual price of $250-289/year. Otherwise your not going to be me and others to subscribe to that service and many of us just might go ahead and change to quickbooks service. You got a great program! Don’t screw it up by being too greedy by overcharging for the service. At least this is my opinion!!!

Review.Titre: i want to save my neat on my computers…
Review.Contenu: i want to save my neat on my computers external hard drive and not cloud base

Review.Titre: TO LONG TO GET A HOLD OF SUPPORT REP…
Review.Contenu: TO LONG TO GET A HOLD OF SUPPORT REP DIDN'T KNOW HOW TO HELP. NOT HAPPY

Review.Titre: My problem was not solved but he tried…
Review.Contenu: My problem was not solved but he tried his best to help.

Review.Titre: Website had problems...Micah the rep…
Review.Contenu: Website had problems...Micah the rep was very good

Review.Titre: Love May Ann G.!
Review.Contenu: Love May Ann G.!Don't love the product, yet.

Review.Titre: Too difficult to get to the appropriate…
Review.Contenu: Too difficult to get to the appropriate advisor.

Review.Titre: not as convent & easy to use as cliamed
More work needs to be done to the…
Review.Contenu: More work needs to be done to the app!!!!!!!

Review.Titre: Very informative and well worth the…
Review.Contenu: Very informative and well worth the time, I would have been completely lost without this training,It was hard to get going on the schedule

Review.Titre: Slow after clicking on the SEND button. At times, it has taken up to TEN (10) minutes before the document is available .
Review.Contenu: Had a problem with NO DOCUMENT DISPLAY in any of my folders. I contacted customer service, and was guided through the process of clearing my cachs, (which had caused the problem after an update was done by NEAT without informing the users about the problem it caused).

Review.Titre: Liza did a wonderful job transferring…
Review.Contenu: Liza did a wonderful job transferring all the data from the retired Neat app to the new one. It took a while, but, she did it.  Thank you Liza!

Review.Titre: Thanks Liza for Great Customer Service!
Review.Contenu: Thanks Liza for Great Customer Service!Although it took awhile for a rep to join the chat, once Liza came online she immediately addressed my issue. Strong and capable CSR’s are vitally important, so it appears your properly training your people to meet customers needs and expectations.

Review.Titre: Thankful for Liza
Review.Contenu: The initial interaction of trying to explain in a chat box is frustrating, but the silver lining is that it connected me with Liza. Liza was extremely helpful, and once we spoke on the phone it was easier to convey what my issues were. While my NEAT was down for a week, some issues on my end were some of the cause, Liza worked very hard to get me taken care of.

Review.Titre: I like your product and have been using…
Review.Contenu: I like your product and have been using it for over 5 years and the only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because I haven't been able to see my invoices for my monthly fees for a few months now. I would think a company whose main business is tracking expenses would be able to sort our this issue faster than it has. Liza did a great job in trying to get things resolved and emailed a copy of my invoice so I could reconcile my credit card statement and I appreciate her efforts. As soon as I can see my invoices without jumping through hoops I will give a five star rating.

Review.Titre: Password change
Review.Contenu: Needed a password change which was accomplished successfully by Liza. Took a little longer than I had hoped for when I contacted the chat. Wondered if the rep was working more than my issue.

Review.Titre: Neat Scanner software was supported again w/ latest MacOS!
Review.Contenu: I was very disappointed in 2020 when I learned that the Neat Co announced that they discontinued software support for their scanners. They were moving in the direction of info management. I purchased the software for about 67% of the hardware scanner that I had bought several years ago. I was not able to get it to work & did not have time to address due to competing priorities, instead relying on the iPhone scanning apps. Subsequently, I saw an "annual" renewal which I was upset about. When I finally called, the rep stated that the company now was supporting the updated Mac software & had a cheaper package. He walked me through the installation process & I was thrilled to have my scanner functional again! I was also thrilled to see him plan to refund me > $150! If so, I will now again be a supporter of this product (ND-1000)!=== 2023: unfortunately, they discontinued their software support for the great scanner so I discontinued with their service…

Review.Titre: Tech support fell a little short, Billing support was ok
Review.Contenu: Initially I had a difficult time to get technical support to assist me with my issue.  I could not get chat started and there was no phone number easily found to call Tech Support.  I took out a trial subscription for support and never received an email about being charged for a yearly subscription.  I called the phone number on my credit card statement and was able to get to tech support and get the issue resolved, which is a work around of sorts, but I am finally able to use my neat scanner again.  I then called and talked to billing regarding why I didn't get a notification of the charge and asked if there was a month-to-month option.  The rep requested the refund of the yearly subscription and will process a monthly subscription.  The billing rep was courteous and helpful.  The Tech support rep was a bit difficult to understand and it took over an hour for a process that I believe should have only taken maybe 30 minutes or less.

Review.Titre: I should give 5 stars
Review.Contenu: I should give 5 stars, but with most reviews I do if I do, I seldom give  the highest points. To be honest, a 5 star here should be given due to the fact Liza e-mailed me back in June when I first approached NEAT. Then when I e-mailed her back today 9/22'/22 and didn't connect, she persisted and called me. That's dedication for sure.   If "things" would change in the future will be sure to call her. Thanks

Review.Titre: Some initial delays in communication…
Review.Contenu: Some initial delays in communication but they went above and beyond. Their issues are on keeping up with new Apple releases for their scanner drivers, but I think they have phased out of their own scanners. I only wish Neat made it simpler to scan receipts in via other scanners!Hi! I see you think that Liza was able to install a scanner driver - that isn’t true. She was awesome in trying, but if you check with her, you will see it didn’t work. She stated that you all are aware that you don’t have a scanner driver that works with the latest OS for Mac.Thanks! And thank you for working on the issue - you guys rock. Outside of this one thing, everything about NEAT is awesome!

Review.Titre: Great representative
Review.Contenu: At my old age I have a difficult time with computerize and find that this is a confusing platform - UNTIL I managed to speak with an actual representative and she did an excellent job helping to me correct my problem. Thanks to her I feel that my problem has been rectified.

Review.Titre: Had an issue with items taking…
Review.Contenu: Had an issue with items taking extremely long to process. Liza was able to help me resolve the issue.

Review.Titre: Dolly the lady who helped me was very…
Review.Contenu: Dolly the lady who helped me was very informative and very kind.

Review.Titre: NEATTECH+5 did an excellent JOb and was…
Review.Contenu: NEATTECH+5 did an excellent JOb and was Professional and Courteous. Thanks

Review.Titre: Good patient customer service
Review.Contenu: Hi Anna helped me Friday afternoon and I learned a lot from her! She was also patient with me as I had to stop her quite a few times for clarification due to my hearing loss. However, I wonder how crystal clear your phone connection is because there seemed to be an issue with her voice breaking up often.

Review.Titre: It took too long to resolve the issue
Great service
Review.Contenu: Great service! Very helpful.

Review.Titre: Well to start,I was the only one who…
Review.Contenu: Well to start,I was the only one who showed up to the 1on 1 appt. After 3 hrs -I finally met w/Stephen who was able to get it all flowing after many trial & errors .. it took a while on my part downloading & restarting but, in the end I can say the program has improved tremendously! I can’t wait to get the hang of it so that it is effortless. Still have a few more things to figure out ! Here’s to 2021!

Review.Titre: May Ann G.
Review.Contenu: I did not have to wait long for an agent.  The agent, May Ann G., was professional and courteous.  She did not show irritation at my lack of technical expertise, and did what she could to solve my problem.  The problem remains, but she gave me clear instructions and a demonstration of how to "get around" it.

Review.Titre: I was disappointed by the high cost of…
Review.Contenu: I was disappointed by the high cost of the annual Neat fee and requested cancelation.  The representative, Ramon said he could give me a discounted rate for this year if I'd stay. I stayed for this year, but I'm hoping Neat offers a cheaper product choice for next year.

Review.Titre: Great Customer Support
Review.Contenu: Great customer support. I Have been a users for several years and I am a satisfied customer. The only reason I am not offering a 5 star rating is because I feel if I am paying $150 per year for the service I should be able to have a live person to speak to and not online chat support. the online chat support I have always received has been second to none. Very professional. J.V.C Stuart FL

Review.Titre: Fantastic support by Liza (neatteck+5)…
Review.Contenu: Fantastic support by Liza (neatteck+5) getting my files transferred.  I was disappointed that I had to pay $150.00/year for a product that I purchased and was told that there would be no further charges or fees. All of my data was locked out. This was VERY important financial data used for tax filing since 1013.  I realy like the new system. It would have been better if I were not forced to purchase it.  I probably would have opted to upgrade if given the option.

Review.Titre: ANGELINA WAS AMAZING ON LIVE CHAT!…
Review.Contenu: ANGELINA WAS AMAZING ON LIVE CHAT!I was initially disappointed that when contacting the online customer service phone number, it kept disconnecting me when I selected "tech support". However, I did try the LIVE CHAT and got connected with ANGELINA.  She was amazing!!  Helped me very quickly to resolve my problem.   I would give her 10 stars.  She was so wonderful!  She also followed up the chat with an email with helpful links to using Neatworks.

Review.Titre: Good customer support
Review.Contenu: Was not aware that the desktop software that I was using was being sunset.After getting a new PC (Windows 10) I was unable to get neat software in a usable state.   Contacted Neat support and after much time (45 minutes), we were able to utilize the software.Luv was very patient and polite.   He stayed on the phone during the entire installation/configuration process.

Review.Titre: Customer Support for Scanners
Review.Contenu: Today I worked with Customer service to get the NeatConnect scanner set up, This device was purchased before they quit supporting, and has not been used until now. Though their site said it is no longer supported (which is the reason for the 4 stars) customer service still helped. Unfortunately, the first two agents I dealt with left the chat before solving the problem. But the third, Angelina, stuck with me until she resolved the issue and got it all to work. Thank you.

Review.Titre: The process of moving files from legacy…
Review.Contenu: The process of moving files from legacy software to the new cloud version was tedious. The tech lady was working from home and could only see my screen, but could not take it over.  She had great patience with me and got the job done. I hope the developers can streamline the migration and religion in procedures.

Review.Titre: Mediocre Software but Good Tech support
Review.Contenu: Good tech support once I got to them.  The software has some features (limitations) I was not aware of but they are not deal breakers.   We share a five person (sales) group that uses this for receipts.  The sales guys loved seeing the sales manager receipt for the Mustang Ranch.  Apparently, there is no user privacy .The 4 stars are for the techs.

Review.Titre: The representative at Tech Support was…
Review.Contenu: The representative at Tech Support was very helpful and resolved my issue quickly. However, when I call for help with the program, it seems as though I can not get to tech support directly and spend a lot of time with the first operator who collects information that I have to repeat all over again once I reach tech support.

Review.Titre: After suffering through using the…
Review.Contenu: After suffering through using the orange icon with neat, they finally have something that does not take all day to process one document.  The customer support rep was more than willing to install the new software on my computer and give me a short tutorial on how to use it.  She was one of the best support reps I have dealt with.

Review.Titre: My experience today with May Ann in IT at the NEAT company
Review.Contenu: My experience today with May Ann in IT was very good.  She recognized the problem right away and fixed it in just a few minutes. Excellent service!As for the company, I don't like the fact that you have to pay for the service now and pay more if you want IT service. It may be the way the world is going, I just can't afford to keep paying all these companies a monthly fee.

Review.Titre: Dedicated agent stayed on my issue until she got the neat software to run
Review.Contenu: The agent worked very hard to get the neat software installed on my machine.  She had a very difficult time getting around some compatibility issues but stayed at it until she came up with a workaround.  I recently had to reinstall Windows 7 and then upgrade to 10 causing me to lose all of the applications and reinstall all of them.  I am having problems with a couple of other apps so I appreciate the time and effort that the tech spent getting me running.

Review.Titre: Rep was great!
Review.Contenu: May Ann G. is the only reason they are receiving a great review, during the training process the program loaded very slowly, the receipt did not load the right numbers and left over half the entries blank. I'm glad I did this 1 on 1 meeting before purchasing the subscription. I will be shopping around more for something that works. But Mary Ann G. was friendly and helped explain how to use everything in detail and let me ask questions. Great customer service skills to Mary!

Review.Titre: Excellent Support
Review.Contenu: I have had excellent support from the NEAT support team; quickly assessing my issue and using every effort to resolve it, including very good follow up -- actually doing what they say they are going to do!  The only reason this is not a 5 star review is because I would have wished not to have the issues in the first place.  But Neat has a 5-star support team.

Review.Titre: The person I spoke to was hard to…
Review.Contenu: The person I spoke to was hard to understand and there was static on the line.  Very hard to communicate.  There were other questions I wanted to ask, but couldn't because of the bad communication.  Had to communicate via chat.  I've been learning as I go, but still there are times I would like to talk to a human and one that I can understand.  Please hire people that can speak Texas language for the ones of us that live in Texas.

Review.Titre: Neat has recently abandoned hardware…
Review.Contenu: Neat has recently abandoned hardware but the integration of other vendor hardware does not yet have the same ease of use as when they controlled the hardware - yet. Not that it is bad - just different and less fused compared to what I was use to. The new NEAT Software does not recognize network hardware but requires a link to scanned files - cumbersome.

Review.Titre: I had to renew my premium cloud service…
Review.Contenu: I had to renew my premium cloud service and the assistance I received was very good.I only give 4 stars because I am so disappointed in the software compared to the old legacy software. Being now retired I use Neat for personal use. I miss many of the old features, I can hardly read the scanned items, I cannot forward a folder to my CPA,...

Review.Titre: The migration process took much longer…
Review.Contenu: The migration process took much longer than expected (took place over 3 days), and it was difficult to understand the representative both because of his accent and background noise, but he was very polite and professional and got the job done! I'm very glad I didn't try to migrate the data myself.

Review.Titre: Up and running in the cloud version
Review.Contenu: Up and running in the cloud version.  Many, many documents were migrated from the desktop version 5.4 but lost their title and date entered.  Has been a real pain to have to open each document, determine what it is and give it a name and date.  Also have found a bug that freezes NEAT.  Am working on this with support.

Review.Titre: Like it very much
Review.Contenu: When I first got it, it would not process the items scanned.  It just kept saying processing but never finished.  I called for support and they had to do some adjustments to my computer then it worked fine.  This has eliminated all the clutter of paper on my desk and in file cabinets that were over flowing.  Would and have recommended this product to all my friends.

Review.Titre: I found NEAT to be indispensable in my…
Review.Contenu: I found NEAT to be indispensable in my line of work which involved global travel many times to remote areas where copying services etc were not available.For anyone who needs a portable office in a suitcase NEAT is a good choice, It is very light and portable and can be setup for use in seconds.

Review.Titre: Easy to use, simplifies paperwork
Review.Contenu: I've used Neat Receipts for years. It's fairly easy to use on a Mac, although the Mac software hasn't been updated for a while. I also have Neat Cloud, and loved that until the last update. Adding receipts on the fly should be wham bam easy, and I should be able to set preferences once and take my picture, and move on. Over all, I still will continue to use it, although I may not do as much uploading from the IPhone app.

Review.Titre: Steven worked with me to resolve issues…
Review.Contenu: Steven worked with me to resolve issues with my neat scan utility on my computer and to walk me through the system, explain my questions with regard to what the system will or won't do, to include printing and reports.  Very patient and understanding.

Review.Titre: The Neat customer service…
Review.Contenu: The Neat customer service representative, Lud, was very professional and helpful with the upgrading process.  The conversion of date to the newer updated software was extremely difficult and quite lengthy.  I would not have upgraded our system if  Lud was not available to help with the process.

Review.Titre: I don't have a specific incident, but...
Review.Contenu: I don't have a specific incident, but I have been using Neat for many years and although it is a generally fine product and works well with no major issues, I have several points to bring up. 1. The ACCOUNT NO. field only allows whole numbers; no letters, no leading zeros and no periods or other characters. This field should allow these other characters.2. The last time I used the Android version of Neat app, it would only bring up the first page of a stored image. It most of the time refused to show pages after the first one. I haven't had a chance to spend time with the web version so I'm hoping it is more responsive.

Review.Titre: Mark was helpful and knowledgeable
Review.Contenu: Mark was helpful and knowledgeable. He was also easier for me to understand than many of the other people staffing your help center. Speaking of the help center: Please find a way to get rid of the background noise. Callers can barely hear, especially when many of the staffers speak very accented English. Also: it would be helpful if the tech support people were available until at least 10 p.m. weekdays and some weekend hours. I had to take time off from work so that I could finish a Neat migration at home!

Review.Titre: need Tutorials for each change to Neat
Review.Contenu: Frustrated by constant changes and new system every time I seem to log in. Plus reports are difficult to generate under new system and I needed a support person to walk me through as the 31 page summary of how to do it was impossible to locate and videos showing how were outdated and irrelevant.  I have been a customer for many years but I think tutorials should go out (by category) so that users can learn the system each time it is revised.  Support person was patient and we were finally able to walk through changes to report generation

Review.Titre: Customer service fine..New company technology leaves older customers on the fringe
Review.Contenu: I have little or no problem with tower service, where I have issues is as technology in their company changes they tend to leave older customers and programs in the dust. It is more like here is what we are doing now so purchase the new and improved or tough. We might be able to help and we might not.

Review.Titre: Cyrus helped me through a crisis in my…
Review.Contenu: Cyrus helped me through a crisis in my office. A former employee had changed the password to my NEAT software AND we discovered she had not upgraded to the latest version.Cyrus spend many hours working with me to upgrade the software and convert our files before finally helping me with the password issue.I appreciate all the time Cyrus spent with me. Communication was a bit tough as I do not sit at that employee's desk and do not use her e-mail. Once I got a phone number, it was much easier to get to him.Thank you again for all your efforts!

Review.Titre: Legacy File Migration
Review.Contenu: Have tried to migrate my legacy files to the cloud which has taken the better part of a week.  Many errors were encountered and fixed along the way.  Working with the cloud version is something that will take a bit of time to get used to but it seems to work okay.  Some of the windows that open to review or move files to their proper destination are a bit cobby.  Trying to navigate in a small window is not comfortable.  Why not make the window larger so that there is less scrolling and clicking.  On another note, Neatteam+6 was very helpful and patient which was appreciated.

Review.Titre: can't get on cloud
Review.Contenu: My name is Geri Yaccarino and my employer is Olivia H.  It keeps asking for her password and she doesn't know it.  I try to put in for a change and asked again for the former password which we don't have.  This is my e-mail not hers and I am the only one TO use this program.  I need help to solve this problem.

Review.Titre: My question regarding the sorting of…
Review.Contenu: My question regarding the sorting of business cards by Last Name was understood by my CSR. Let's hope he is able to communicate the need and logic of Last Name sort over the current First Name sort to the technical staff. Let's make this change; it will make Net a more useful program.

Review.Titre: Problem solved for now
Review.Contenu: Kimart did a good job of resolving my problem.   I believe I had a technical problem with my NeatVerify credits refreshing, but he persevered and sought and gained approval to provide me with the credits I believed I was due.  I will be watching to see if the credits update correctly in May.

Review.Titre: Love being able to find my receipts in one location.
Review.Contenu: I absolutely love being able to find all of my receipts in one place.  I can make the category titles that make sense to me. I like being able to "outline" the category into sub-categories.I find it easy to get together the information for my taxes, butI still have not seemed to have mastered the ability to make a sensible, usable report though.  I think it's me.Thanks for this great product.  I also appreciate the help fixing the scanner a while back; it's working great now.

Review.Titre: Overall, the system works
Review.Contenu: Hello, Overall I am pleased with the service. The challenge is the system crashes A LOT!!!  When you need support you have to wait. Then the person says its you? I love how it can store and provide reports.  I love how i can scan with my phone. However, you end up having multiple account set up on your cloud?

Review.Titre: The representative was wonderful . . .
Review.Contenu: I'm not happy that Neat requires a subscription and cloud account.  There are those of us that can't access "the cloud."  All that to say that the representative on my support call (Lorren) was wonderful and patient and was able to graciously help me with my request.

Review.Titre: On-line support Staff
Review.Contenu: The staff providing on line support has been wonderful. They were patient and helpful resolving any question that occurred. In particular, Caesar ensured that the migration of data from the 'old' system to the new system progressed without difficulty.

Review.Titre: Mixed feelings but Neat is working again.
Review.Contenu: It wasn’t always clear what the tech was asking me to do but she was able to take control of my machine and fix the issue. I was confused and a bit annoyed that she then tried to get me to upgrade to a more expensive subscription that didn’t appear to offer anything different than I had and couldn’t give me a good reason why. As an Apple user I have always felt that Neat gives my platform second priority status and there have been many glitches and bugs in the program. If I hadn’t had my data already in Neat I would have abandoned it many times in the past. It does appear better than it was, though, and the quick access to support was refreshing and new in my experience.

Review.Titre: The cable connecting my NC-1000 to the…
Review.Contenu: The cable connecting my NC-1000 to the computer became defective.  I sent a service request to purchase a new cable.  The cable was shipped within 2 days.  The only issue I have is there is no telephone number to call if there is a problem.

Review.Titre: i appreicated the help in fixing the… "VIEW IMAGE" display
Review.Contenu: i appreicated the help in fixing the proplem....      we had some communication problems -- i seemed to be disconnected at one point... and i didn't know where the chat went.    In the end it was resolved and i hope the problem is fixed.  thank you very much

Review.Titre: I have a Neat device that I purchased…
Review.Contenu: I have a Neat device that I purchased from Best Buy a few years ago and it is not compatible to my computer because it not get updates. To buy a new one I have to pay a monthly fee to use my neat, that sucks. Every thing I have stored over the years I can’t get to.

Review.Titre: I had a good experience with my…
Review.Contenu: I had a good experience with my customer service tech person. Unfortunately my scanner keeps getting a paper jam. I will call in the morning to see if there is a fix to this. Also I tried to export contact to Google but kept getting an error message

Review.Titre: Leslie M helped conduct a data migration
Review.Contenu: Leslie M helped conduct a data migration to a new account as I needed to change my email address.  I would have hoped this was an easier task, however, Leslie spent about 5 hours doing the full migration.  Thanks for continuing to upgrade your services, however some could be quicker than others.  Been a loyal customer for more than 4 years now and the improvements are a bit slow compared to the competition.  Hopefully the credit for the unused portion of my previous account is refunded as promised.  All the work required for a simple email address change seems to not be very cost effective for the Neat Company.

Review.Titre: I've only had 5.1 installed
Review.Contenu: I've only had 5.1 installed . I backed up my work , my computer quit now I tried to use my back up copy  it tells me that my back up copy is for a newer version and won't install ??? how did my 5.1 version get to be a newer version???

Review.Titre: Liza C helped me this morning with some…
Review.Contenu: Liza C helped me this morning with some issues that I couldn't figure out using the FAQs.  She solved everything instantly and in a very easy to understand vernacular.  I advise all of my friends (especially the disorganized ones) to get Neat!

Review.Titre: Some of the replies were slow in…
Review.Contenu: Some of the replies were slow in coming.  I had also sent an after hours message on your live chat a few days ago and never received a response.  Also, I did not need a sales pitch at the end introducing me to new Neat plans.

Review.Titre: The background noise during the call…
Review.Contenu: The background noise during the call made it very hard to hear the lady providing service. The call took much longer than anticipated because her voice was covered by all kinds of background noise and everything had to be repeated.

Review.Titre: Myron was very helpful in repairing my…
Review.Contenu: Myron was very helpful in repairing my neat desk issue. He logged in and completed the task very quickly and efficiently. He did a great job! My only complaint would be about how hard it is to find information on contacting neat desk!

Review.Titre: Problem with latest app update
Review.Contenu: Had problems accessing the app only to discover it has changed to full web base application. Could not get my Neat scanner to work and called support. Was difficult at first understanding the total change in the application. The support technician was very helpful and worked with me for a couple of hours. Ended up having to install the scanner app on my laptop instead of my desktop PC. Finally got the scanner working but then discovered all of my previous scanned documents from previous years were missing.  The technician informed me I now need to schedule an online tutorial on the new application. This part is very frustrating over the past few years with switching to full web based and all documents in the cloud.

Review.Titre: Problem with archiving.
Review.Contenu: Think there should be more specific directions on how to archive on your site.Do not like the light gray bar where totals appear on  the bottom of a page. Very difficult to read. Previous bar with the arrows is much better in my opinion.

Review.Titre: It would've been 5 if there wasn't so…
Review.Contenu: It would've been 5 if there wasn't so much noise in the background, it sound like there are a bunch of people in a foreign country taking within tight quarters, I could hear multiple trouble shooting conversations.

Review.Titre: Good customer service.  Immature product.
Review.Contenu: I tested Neat as a tool to scan paper and e-mail receipts to organize them in order to submit an expense report to our accounting department.  The OCR features identified about 75% of the data from the scans and e-mails that I submitted.  The interface for cleaning up that data and reporting it in a form sufficient for an expense report is very immature and not sufficient to make the process easy or efficient.  It appears that the company agrees because they said they are in the process of replacing all existing software with something totally new.  But they would not give a timeline for when that new software would be available.  I will look for another alternative.

Review.Titre: Sometimes going thru the scanning…
Review.Contenu: Sometimes going thru the scanning process is not as efficient as one would like to see. Other than that I have loved Neat for 8 years. I love that I have files at my fingertip that I have created to fit my needs any where I am

Review.Titre: Time-Consuming But Effective
Review.Contenu: This migration took a LONG time but I really appreciated having the support to get it done. The tech, Meryl, was helpful and proactive about contacting me daily to keep the process moving forward until it was done.

Review.Titre: Neat is Truly NEAT Again!
Review.Contenu: Before I say anything else, I will say this: Over the past two years (in my experience) The Neat Company has done an AMAZING job improving their product offerings, support and service.Long ago there were some very dark, frustrating days/weeks/months/years working with them and their products. I can't tell you how happy I am to say, "Not any more." My support issue today was resolved quickly and painlessly by Francis M.Not one to dwell on the past, I'm doubling-down on my Neat investment and will be upgrading to their Premium Cloud Service in January 2019. Thanks, Neat, for not giving up or giving in and doing what is right for both you and your customers!

Review.Titre: The Cloud Solution is missing lots of…
Review.Contenu: The Cloud Solution is missing lots of the functionality of the standalone PC version.   You can not copy and split expenses any more.  This functionality is totally gone which makes keeping records more accurate.

Review.Titre: The support person that helped me was great
Review.Contenu: The support person that helped me was excellent.Unfortunately, in the west coast customer support is not available after 5:00 pm, that is very inconvenient for those of us who work until 6:00 pm or later.

Review.Titre: I am happy with the tool and the…
Review.Contenu: I am happy with the tool and the customer service was spot on.  I was not happy to find out that the human verification feature is limited to 30 a month.  I found out that the business plan has 100 a month.  I received a one on one training that was very helpful by May Ann G.  Navigating the software is very straight forward, Mary Ann clarified all the necessary steps.  The software can see some improvement in being able to classify the type of transaction with several entries at once.  The only downside at the moment is that you have to open every item separately and re-classify the tax type or class of transaction (meals, transportations etc.)  I would be nice to select 15 scans and classify all with one click.

Review.Titre: Neat is still not capable of providing what they did Pre - Cloud Version
Review.Contenu: They have a good product now but it is not as versatile as the original product.  I can no longer adjust the Neat program output, in Excel format, to label the columns, move columns to fit my existing database format, and include blank columns as I could easily do before. I also can no longer automatically split receipt amounts in half or thirds and export data in two or three line formats. This has made data entry quite time consuming for me.And I've been trying for some time to get Neat to list the current program version on their website but have not been successful. I need to download the program from the website and try to install it, only to find out that I have the most recent program version.

Review.Titre: Great tech support from Leslie M
Review.Contenu: Great tech support from Leslie M, but the product lost functionality for the same level of previous service. With our premium account, we had multiple users - typical in a family situation. Now the multiple users are only in the business plan, at a higher rate.The reason for the support call was a result of changing an email address. Not uncommon in this day of hacked accounts. It took 3 days of constant work to transfer all of our records to a new email address. Hopefully, this is fixed in the cloud version.Having said that, the Neat product is reliable, scans and interprets very well, and makes tax time that much easier to provide data and images for tax accountants with its built in tax categories and report features.

Review.Titre: I could not get Neat software to work…
Review.Contenu: I could not get Neat software to work on my computer.  The Software Tech, accessed my computer, fixed the issues and it now works great.  Very simple, very straightforward and professional.  Thank you.

Review.Titre: The experience was okay but it took…
Review.Contenu: The experience was okay but it took longer than I thought it would and in the process some of my records were dropped and I had to reload half of 2018 and what I had already loaded for 2019.

Review.Titre: Cyrus was great
Review.Contenu: Cyrus was great. He actually stayed on the telephone with me while resolving my issue. I now have a different view of the customer support for the product and will to continue using it.

Review.Titre: Very helpful
Review.Contenu: Very helpful, great customer service. The rep I dealt with could do to listen a little better, as they misspelled my email after it was spelled out to them 3 times, but it is a minor gripe.

Review.Titre: Ramon was great
Review.Contenu: Ramon was great, as was Angelina who helped me with an earlier need I had. They were both very personable and professional and helped me with my problems.

Review.Titre: I was a Neat Legacy user for many years…
Review.Contenu: I was a Neat Legacy user for many years saving my receipts for IRS purposes. When Legacy was no longer available without notification, I moved to the Cloud. A Neat assistant tried to move my Legacy data over to the Cloud, (a small amount of data from 2012 was moved successfully, however a data file of over 1gb could not be moved) I have considered this data a loss and have moved forward.My recent phone call concerned the ability of splitting a receipt i.e. a medical prescription vs household items or groceries. I was informed this work was in progress and would possibly be incorporated at a later date.As an old school user, I still am not convinced the Cloud is safer than storing my data on an external drive and back-up to a flash drive, but I am trying to change my mind.Thank you.

Review.Titre: Great online support
Representative's patience
Review.Contenu: It took quite awhile to resolve my issue. I appreciated the patience of Boogie as we worked through to a resolution. He was able to solve the problem and I am back in business.

Review.Titre: Today's interaction was good
Review.Contenu: Today's interaction was good.  I was not able to actually get my problem resolved, though.In the future, it would help if tech support tickets were responded to.

Review.Titre: Response on customer service
Review.Contenu: Friendly & helpful. However, it felt like knowledge was lacking in areas & quite a lot of time was taken to read for info to help.

Review.Titre: Takes awhile to get tech on line
Review.Contenu: Takes awhile to get tech on line, however once on is very informative.Then they want to up charge you to premium.I am a retired man and only scan spongelike receipts

Review.Titre: New version not what I expected
Review.Contenu: Fix is not what I expected. It downloads a new app for scanning which is superior by optimizing and reducing file size. It hangs occasionally, but is generally acceptable. The new app does not take you directly to the NEAT app. I was told I was using the old "orange" version of NEAT and should use the "blue version". The blue scan app is the new version- it doesn't take you to the NEAT desktop. You need to use the old orange version if you want to work on your desktop (which I prefer) or otherwise work in the cloud version going through the website with no quick link. Many of us prefer to work on our desktops and mirror on the web based version. Everything works better but getting custom reports is still difficult. This is a major improvement over the last two years but still lacks the functionality of the original (non web) version from 4 years ago.

Review.Titre: I am very good with the chat person
Review.Contenu: I am very good with the chat person. I am very disappointed in the newest cloud version of the product and cancelled it after many years using the previous products.

Review.Titre: Support was able to process my order…
Review.Contenu: Support was able to process my order but frustrated website would not allow me to order.  Wasted two days trying to order a simple subscription of Neat Desk Lite

Review.Titre: disappointed
Review.Contenu: HI Ms Liza was very nice and patientbut am dissatisfied because my problem was not solvedI still cant login the neat because the neat I have is a out dated

Review.Titre: Sarah was a very patient and kind…
Review.Contenu: Sarah was a very patient and kind individual.  She was able to answer all my concerns and if she did not have the answer, she would not hesitate to contact someone who could help.  I would have no problem working with her again.On another note however.  Even though I have enjoyed using NEAT over the past 8 years, I personally believe it was a big mistake to change the program from 5.7 to legacy.  Sarah helped me to learn and use the newer program to the point that i fully understood it.  It is not user friendly and not easy to go from scan to home to reporting to saving and printing without going back and forth to the app.  I firmly believe that you had a program that fully satisfied my business needs perfectly and I would like to see you reinstate supporting it.  I will continue to use 5.7.  I hope this is valuable to you and you take it seriously.  Thank you.Larry Boemmels...A LONG TIME USER

Review.Titre: After 5 years of using Neat...
Review.Contenu: I've been using Neat for almost five years. I recently upgraded from the legacy software and Neat support worked with my data to upload it to the Cloud. I had a lot of data, and it took several days to get it all uploaded but the rep I worked with was thorough, responsive, and professional. I've had some frustrations with features that existed in the legacy software that have 'disappeared' in the new version. And when I reach out to support via email, to ask clarification questions I get a canned email response of "...That feature is not available -- we'll pass it onto the development team" -- even when that answer does not fit my question at all. I do hope these disappearing features (some of which are obvious programming ball drops) are fixed soon.Per your note below -- how do I reply/forward case # info to you? (Hopefully, you see this edit to this post but...)

Review.Titre: Updates on the product followed up with phone call…
Review.Contenu: First year that changes on the product from last year were followed up with a phone call / online tutorial on how to use the product.  Very helpful.

Review.Titre: Very helpful
Review.Contenu: Very helpful, learned how to set Neat and Scan Snap up properly.  Sometimes difficult to understand due to language differences.  Pleasant assistance

Review.Titre: I always get a courteous representative…
Review.Contenu: I always get a courteous representative whenever I contact Neat. They are very helpful in resolving any issues I have with very little assistance from me.

Review.Titre: Great customer support - Liza C!
Review.Contenu: I was given exactly the level of attention a customer should receive. I was contemplating converting back from NeatVault to Neat Year (after taking off a year from Neat web experience) and wasn't sure whether it was the right thing to do.Liza listened and convinced me that I'd benefit from the conversion. Additionally, she gave me a price break and a pro-rated NeatVault refund, which I gladly accepted.I am much happier now :)

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service
Review.Contenu: I must say my problem took quite a few sessions to resolve but the tech that helped me had the patience of Job.  I kept messing up the download but she kept in contact with me and made sure that my problem was resolved.  Kudoes to her.

Review.Titre: Help At My Fingertips
Review.Contenu: I had attended one of the training webinars and remembered a method of duplicating folders but could not recall the process. This call was to recover that technique and use in preparation for next year’s filings.The agent was most helpful and took me right to the solution.

Review.Titre: Customer service from Liza was great
Review.Contenu: Customer service from Liza was great. In general, the subscription is expensive, I don’t like that I can’t bulk download pdfs, and I am uncomfortable with my data being on your server instead of my computer. That said, I have not found an alternative. It would be good if I could designate “frequently used” folders, and if opened trees stayed open, to reduce the number of clicks when importing multiple docs.

Review.Titre: Liza said a great job
Review.Contenu: Liza said a great job. And figured out my issue then resolved it

Review.Titre: Neat support tec Liza case #00516143
Review.Contenu: Neat support tec Liza case #00516143 was very understanding of my issue. Liza was efficient and prompt to correct my issue with the Neat Utility driver.

Review.Titre: Help from Lisa C.
Review.Contenu: I needed help getting the icon on my home page for the neat software. Thanks to Lisa C. Help that was accomplished in record time. Thank you. NEAT does need to make a simplier/cheaper version for those just track receipts fir taxes.

Review.Titre: Liza was very good!
Review.Contenu: The representative Liza, that was extremely helpful. This was a pleasant surprise as most of my previous experiences with Neat  support have not been good.

Review.Titre: Patient, Caring, Kind & Professional
Review.Contenu: Liza was the most patient, caring & kind and Professional Tech I have ever worked with! Merging my 15 years of data from my computer hard drive to my new Neat account online was not a task for the faint at heart! She very carefully checked and rechecked to confirm that every single file and entry was correctly transferred to my Neat cloud account. Thank you Neat for hiring superior quality customer service technicians. And, thank you Liza for carefully walking me through the merging process and helping me get started on scanning into my new cloud account!!!

Review.Titre: The agent was patient and had no…
Review.Contenu: The agent was patient and had no problem staying with you until you got it. he was knowledgeable and we succeeded in our task.:)

Review.Titre: I chatted with Liza today to resolve an issue and fixed two at one time
Review.Contenu: I chatted with Liza today to resolve an issue I was having with viewing images. She provided me with instruction to fix it, which was very quick and easy. I also asked her to show me how to clean up some of my images and she had instructions for that at the ready. This was a great experience!

Review.Titre: Lisa was great
Review.Contenu: Lisa was great, but it needs to be easier to contact support

Review.Titre: Liza C did a GREAT JOB over chat!
Review.Contenu: Liza C. did a great job helping me access my documents in Neat.  I did the online chat, which was quick and took very little time. She was helpful, professional, and most importantly, she solved my problem! Thanks, Liza C.

Review.Titre: Gr8 Support/Customer Service
Review.Contenu: The quick, convenient, use of alternative password reset, Ty Liza 00512006. I never have issues, love the software and scan utility, this is personal use and makes me paperless, i am confident in the cloud storage as well. Easy, gr8 tool..... John

Review.Titre: Neat Employee Saved the Day!
Review.Contenu: I was having trouble remembering how to do a specific report. I reached out on CHAT and Liza came on to help! After trying, unsuccessfully, to generate a duplicate report from last year, She finally asked to access my computer. That was done through Zoho and after much trial and error, she was able to get my problem solved! She was very patient with me and very persistent in resolving my problem. Liza was top notch in my opinion! Thank you Neat, for hiring good employees!

Review.Titre: Terrific people who work there
Review.Contenu: The people who work there are terrific.  Knowledgeable, polite, helpful, courteous, want to provide excellent customer service and invite you to call back.

Review.Titre: Scanner not working.
Review.Contenu: Had an older version of Neat. Started having problems with it and also had a hard drive failure. Purchased the on line version but my scanner would not work. Called in for a tech to help. She was outstanding. Worked through a bunch of processes and was able to not only get the scanner to work, but scan better. She also walked me through the way in which I would input data using the Neat scan tool and then uploading it to my on line account. She showed me how to run the most accurate reports for my particular business. She was polite, professional and a joy to work with. Thank you!

Review.Titre: ScanSnap scans not uploading to NeatReceipts
Review.Contenu: While scanning my receipts (ScanSnap ix500), I encountered a problem sending the scans to Neat. The problem was resolved by uninstalling the Neat Scan Utility and reinstalling it. Liza C. was clear and helpful in isolating the issue and resolving the problem.

Review.Titre: Liza C has been outstanding to work…
Review.Contenu: Liza C has been outstanding to work with.  She is very knowledgeable and was able to address our issues.  She also provided valuable advice on how to use the application better

Review.Titre: Liza T
Review.Contenu: Your tech support representative, Liza T., called back to me to be certain that the previous day's support session had done what I needed.  It had NOT, because Liza's efforts and the support from my new scanner vendor (Fujitsa ScanSnap) were not really working. Liza was concerned enough to follow up today.  She knew your system well, so she was able to direct me to log on to NEAT through Google instead of through Safari.  I'm somewhat disappointed that you no longer support your old Desktop version.  It was faster.  But your tech support was excellent.

Review.Titre: Liza C
Review.Contenu: Liza C. Was wonderful.  She worked perfectly helping an individual who’s technology skills are the best to say the least.  If all the specialists are close to who she is.  The service will definitely be worth the fees.  Thanks Liza C.  Appreciate your assistance. Lorenzo

Review.Titre: The representative was knowledgeable and patient
Review.Contenu: The representative was knowledgeable and very patient with me.  He helped me get my new scanner connected to the Neat Utility program enabling me to scan my receipts into the Neat Program.  This was very important to me for I use Neat for my husbands business receipts

Review.Titre: Liza
Review.Contenu: Liza, did a great job solving my problem.  Liza was very patient and helpful.  She did a great job solving the root cause of the Scanchat Home Software and my Fujitsu ix500 printer interface with the Neat program.  She downloaded  a update that was hard to find and downloaded it, she tested  it to make sure it was working and made sure my problem was solved.  Very Skilled.!

Review.Titre: Very pleasant and helpful
Review.Contenu: Very pleasant and helpful. Explained in simple details so was easy to follow instructions.

Review.Titre: Liza was persistent and it worked
Review.Contenu: Liza was persistent and that was what made the process successful. I recently bought a new computer desktop with Windows 11.  My old process didn't work.Liza didn't give up--we made Neat work on my wife's computer which is a Windows 10.Her persistence paid off and she explained I could print cards  and send them tom my computer for storage.She also made the support experience interesting and made me feel confident that we would solve this problem.

Review.Titre: Dolly helped me
Review.Contenu: Dolly helped me, she was courteous and extremely helpful. Basically took my hand and walked me through process. I think that if all your tech are like her then you have a perfect customer service department.

Review.Titre: It's all about the people
Review.Contenu: It's all about the people. Liza C. from the Neat support team is a rock star. She is professional & relentless. She patiently followed my support case for data migration and setting up on a new computer through a painstaking multi-day process, with consistent follow up and detail.   I had to be convinced to pay the small additional fee for the higher level of support after I had just paid for my initial Neat Desk subscription, but I will say it was well worth it. It is great to now have all my accurate data and history on my office pc, and on the go on their excellent mobile app. I was skeptical at first about having to move from the legacy software to the new cloud-based service, but the features and capability are well worth it, and I highly recommend paying the small fee for the extra support for a year. Liza C. and her team are top notch!

Review.Titre: Excellent Training & Customer Support!
Review.Contenu: Steven was professional, thorough, patient and pleasant and left the doors open to future trainings as my needs called for.  The call was enjoyable and productive.  I can tell a MAJOR improvement has taken place at Neat in customer support.
