Roxie has been incredible as well along with Mary, Rowell and everyone I have interacted with at Neat.I am looking forward to remaining with Neat for a long time.

Review.Titre: Contacted Neat Company for Neat scanner…
Review.Contenu: Contacted Neat Company for Neat scanner Model ND-1000. Needed help with scanner and computer, they were not talking to each other. The excellent support and customer, and professionalism provided from the many associates we spoke with today.  And a special thanks to Mary who did an amazing job to resolve our concerns.  She deserves10 plus!

Review.Titre: Alma made the process which took weeks…
Review.Contenu: Alma made the process which took weeks to complete easyAfter watching and being instructed by Alma I was able to fix erroneous files and keep the upload of 7000+ images working until all the receipts and documents were in the cloudThank you for being responsive to my emails and checking on my progress

Review.Titre: Charlie Wilcox
Review.Contenu: The assistance I received from one of your experts, Alma V. She is remarkably experienced in her knowledge and professionalism and her patience with me. I highly commend her for what she does, so very responsible and caring for the person requesting help. Thank you again Alma V..

Review.Titre: I went into the chat room and was provided and efficient service.
Review.Contenu: I went into the chat room and was immediately serviced by a knowledgeable tech rep who assisted me with a problem I was experiencing getting into Neat.  The problem occurred when I used the wrong password in trying to  open Neat.  I have used Neat for many years and when I need support, someone at Neat is always there.

Review.Titre: Is the scansnap iX6000 fully compatible with Neat?
Review.Contenu: I had a question, the question was answered. Hopefully accurately.This was my question: I am considering purhasing a Fujitsu (Ricoh) ScanSnap iX1600 Wireless / USB scanner. If I use the ScanSnap iX1600 with Wi-Fi are there any Neat functions or features that I won't be able to use?The answer I was given was a little further along ..."All Neat functions will be available to me?"Sent by: You12:02 PMLiza C."Yes that is correct" (I hope the answer is correct)

Review.Titre: Lisa C
Review.Contenu: Lisa C. was very good.  Understood my issue and quickly help me resolve the problem.  Also, great follow-up and review of the resolve.

Review.Titre: I purchased a Neat Desk quite a few…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Neat Desk quite a few years ago (five?) and sadly never unboxed it.  Unfortunately, it is no longer fully supported; although they do have a cloud-based service, which they graciously offered to help me set up using the Neat Desk as my scanner.  Steven was extremely helpful and patient in helping me to get started.  Thank you for the excellent support.

Review.Titre: Jerimar Beboso is a top rate tech support person!
Review.Contenu: Jerimar Beboso is a top rate professional tech support individual.  He worked through a long session to correct  my Neat scanner software and firmware.  He is patient, courteous and kind along with knowledgeable.thank you, Jeri.

Review.Titre: LIZA IS FANTASTIC!!!!!!!!
Review.Contenu: I want to give exceptional praise and gratitude to Liza!  She helped an old lady navigate the transition from my old out of date software to the new one.  Her patience is commendable and her kindness is a treasure in my heart.  Thank you Neat Company for having such amazing customer service.

Review.Titre: Lizza
Review.Contenu: Lizza, the representative that assisted me was outstanding. She knew exactly what needed to be done and walked me through the process to completion. No question about it, if all your technicians are as talented as she is, you can rest easy.

Review.Titre: I rated my recent experience with Neat…
Review.Contenu: I rated my recent experience with Neat online chat five stars because of my experience with Liza. Liza listened and answered my questions. I know their job is to get you to buy a different plan, but I had to say NO at this time.  Neat should info their customers of what's new.

Review.Titre: Clear cache in order for Neat to work properly
Review.Contenu: Liza C was very helpful on my Case # 00514198. Quickly and efficiently helped to resolve the program issue I was having

Review.Titre: Liza had to work with me for a few…
Review.Contenu: Liza had to work with me for a few weeks to get my year-after-year receipts and documents migrated. She was patient, helpful and answered all my questions.

Review.Titre: Teacher/ Tree Farmer
Review.Contenu: Steven did a great job in our 1:1 technology session. He answered all my questions completely and as I kept adding comments and more questions, he responded immediately. As a Ltd subchapter S corporation whose business is education and agriculture, he was very knowledgeable.

Review.Titre: Liza was awesome!
Review.Contenu: Liza was awesome!She worked diligently to get me back up and running. Helping to transfer numerous files from my old desktop version to the new cloud version after my hard drive failed. Years and Years of files! Years of Receipts and Documents covering my cancer treatments that I feared were lost forever.from 8/29/2022 until today 9/26/2022 we worked to get this completedShe is a great asset to your company.

Review.Titre: Fully satisfied Neat user
Review.Contenu: I have been using Neat for a number of years but due to a hardware upgrade I was not being able to upload the software. I reached out to Neat. Lisa took my case and supported me patiently and persistently until the system was working well. I am impressed with the commitment and interest demonstrated.

Review.Titre: Review for Steven
Review.Contenu: I have been a Neat Receipt user for a very long time and not my standalone version is not working, so want to try the cloud version. Steven was masterful in explaining how Neat can help restore and access the old files and that would be the reason, I would use Neat. If that does not work, I will not use Neat. Overall, I appreciate Steven's attention to detail and answering all of my questions.

Review.Titre: Migration
Review.Contenu: Liza C. was very helpful following through with what she said she was going to do. Very efficient and courteous.

Review.Titre: Neat Support is FOR REAL!!
Review.Contenu: I began my customer service journey, yesterday via the chat option. I was paired with Liza and she tried several times to get my scanner to connect to my Wi-Fi system, but to no avail. She explained that we could use a cord, and directly connect to my laptop, pc. Unfortunately, I had to order a cord from Amazon, and wait for it to arrive. This didn’t stop Liza! She called me today, and we worked together to get the scanner working! There are VERY FEW customer service reps that are willing to go that far to help a customer! I am thrilled! Thank you, Liza for your help, and for going the extra mile to bring my problem to an end!

Review.Titre: Smooth transition!
Review.Contenu: After using Neat for over a decade on a Windows platform, IT assistant, Liza made the process of me going to Mac, smooth and professional. NEAT just keeps getting better and better. Thank you NEAT Team!Steve H

Review.Titre: The representative was extremely…helpful and courteous
Review.Contenu: The representative was extremely helpful. She managed to navigate me through the process to resolve my issue better than expected. I came out of the call feeling that I gained more than help that imagined. She was pleasant and very friendly.

Review.Titre: Liza did a great job getting my data…
Review.Contenu: Liza did a great job getting my data from my old Neat software to the cloud based system. It took several days and many hours but she was patient and worked hard to make sure the data was accurately migrated.

Review.Titre: My account had been terminated and I…
Review.Contenu: My account had been terminated and I could not get into the account or contact anyone for help.  I finally got a chat started with Liza who was extremely helpful.  It took quite a while to get through the issues but she did not give up until she had me back into my account!

Review.Titre: Liza was amazing
Review.Contenu: Liza was amazing - very patient.  Explained the process in a way that could be understood.  Liza spent a lot of time with me - explaining the process, fixing my problem, and teaching me how I can import the rest of my documents.

Review.Titre: Liza Review
Review.Contenu: Liza was such an amazing help to me. He helped explain the Neat Scanner Model that I have & how I can still use my scanner. He helped me set up an account, waited while it downloaded, made sure my scanner is set up, how to use my scanner, & he made sure that all my questions were answered & I knew what I was doing before he let me go. Very polite & friendly. Thank you, Liza.

Review.Titre: My Neat Tech helped me transfer my…
Review.Contenu: My Neat Tech helped me transfer my files from Neat Cloud to a backup hard drive on my PC. Neat tech support is the only reason to justify the Annual subscription fee. Even though they make it hard to find the phone number once you do the support you get is worth the hassle. Zoho was and is a excellent support rep.

Review.Titre: Dolly was my Chat Tech today
Review.Contenu: Dolly was my Chat Tech today.  I'll tell you she was a great help today in resolving my issues logging in and recovering my files.  She was very patient with me, and I appreciate her and her knowledge. The was very helpful in all aspects of knowledge in ALL areas of the Neat website!  She is an ASSET to the company and should get a raise!!!

Review.Titre: Update my software
Review.Contenu: After changing from one computer to another, I needed to get up to date software.   Your service technicians were able to do this in a very efficient manner.  I will be learning the new input methods and feel confident that with your help it will be a great experience.

Review.Titre: Legacy Database Migration
Review.Contenu: Neat Support was patient as we migrated a 9-year legacy database with over 10,000 records into Neat Cloud.  Many questions answered during the 5-week process.

Review.Titre: Neat data migration
Review.Contenu: The Neat technician (Liza) had to migrate data from my old laptop hard drive back-up, to my new laptop and Neat cloud. It is a tedious job, but Liza hung with it, was very professional, and got the job done. I appreciate the Neat product/service, and obviously the support that makes the product/service work!! Thanks!

Review.Titre: The representative was concise and…
Review.Contenu: The representative was concise and understood fully the issue I had.I have been a long time user and subscriber but was now having utilizing Neat's cloud based program. Support is very important and I am comfortable I am receiving it.

Review.Titre: Problems Solved
Review.Contenu: I can’t say enough about the help I received from Liza C., the Neat tech that helped me out of the mess I got myself into.I changed internet servers and the email address I had was deleted. Among other things, I couldn’t log into Neat or change my password and I didn’t know why.   All I could think about was that I need to file my taxes and I need Neat to do that.   It was my luck to have a capable, knowledgeable tech, Liza C., pick up my problems and sort them out for me. Amazing, the distance she went to help me.  Neat tells the truth when they say that they want to be sure the customers are taken care of.  They hire people that do just that. Since 2006, my many years with Neat, they continue to be a Five Star company with Five Star employees.

Review.Titre: Each person I have talked with at Neat…
Review.Contenu: Each person I have talked with at Neat have been incredibly helpful and very nice and patient and Alma was also excellent.Thank you so much for having such a great team of employees.Margaret

Review.Titre: Alma was the tech that worked on my Neat account
Review.Contenu: Alma was the tech that worked on my issue.  She was professional and patient with my many questions.  She was able to solve the issue and get my software up and running correctly.  I would definitely use her and Neat again.

Review.Titre: Using Neat Software with Scan Snap IX 500 scanner
Review.Contenu: Liza C. Was so persistent and helpful in following up with me to make sure that my scan snap ix 500 worked with the neat sofware. I really appreciated her help and look forward to using the neat software with my scan snap ix 500 scanner. Michael F.

Review.Titre: Customer Service Is Amazing.
Review.Contenu: I worked with Dolly today.  She was so helpful and very patient.  I had so much to be trained on today and she was very clear with her training and at the end of our session she sent instructions for future review.  I would like to thank her for everything she did today to make my work better organized and very simple to understand her instructions.  Thank you.

Review.Titre: Coupon code not operational.
Review.Contenu: I wanted to renew my subscription using a two-day-only savings code from Neat.com via email. Unable to make a purchase because Neat.com was not excepting  a savings coupon code. After several unsuccessful attempts to make a purchase, I decided to contact customer service. I made contact with representative "LIZA C." The problem that I was having was more complicated, multi-tasked, and time-consuming than was not even expected! Liza throughout the lengthy process session was very professional and knowledgeable about the product. It was necessary to be placed on hold several times during our session    and each time Liza advised of her intentions and made sure I had any questions or concerns. Liza was always professional and yet Liza was always friendly and made sure all my concerns/questions were answered and or resolved. Liza is one of the best reps I have worked with. Neat.com having employees like Liza will ensure them their current and future goals!!Thank you,Ned L. Spessard Jr.

Review.Titre: Neat well done
Review.Contenu: took all the time I needed although I was already familiar with neat for many years but not the ne system.  answered all my questions. He new the system very well.  excellent experience for me!

Review.Titre: LIza did a great job fixing my issue…
Review.Contenu: LIza did a great job fixing my issue with a scan error message.  I am back up and using Neat!

Review.Titre: New Scanner Install
Review.Contenu: Our Neat scanner broke and we had to order a third party scanner.  Liz helped install all the necessary drivers, etc. to get it working.  She did a great job.

Review.Titre: Liza was with me the entire process to get my files transferred!
Review.Contenu: Liza called me every few days to keep up to date on how many files had transferred to the online NEAT.  She left voice messages if I was not available and emailed if I was not available.  She made me feel confident the whole experience that the problem would be solved... and she was correct.  Thank you for ALL your time Liza!

Review.Titre: Representative was excellent!!
Review.Contenu: Representative was excellent!!!   Quickly solved a major problem with my system.  Also provided me information about other new available features that might be of interest to me.  Did not pressure me!!!!  All-in-all a very satisfactory experience.

Review.Titre: Liza was most helpful
Review.Contenu: Liza was most helpful, very patient with my lack of understanding due to hearing aid issues. She was able to discover a way around both of my issues and I am most grateful to her.

Review.Titre: Liza was super helpful
Review.Contenu: Liza was super helpful, very prompt, and super friendly by far one of the best customer  service personnel  I have dealt  with.Thank you so much for your help, and even sending me a link to help with my problem,thank you again ,John

Review.Titre: I just joined Neat this week
Review.Contenu: I just joined Neat this week.  I bought a new computer and after migrating my data from one to the other, I was not able to open up my Neat files.  I used live chat for help.  Liza was my assistant.  Cudo's to Liza.  She was able to remotely connect to my computer and recover my files.  She took the time to transfer and save those files to another folder.  It took us 3 days to accomplish this (about 2 hours at a time) but succeded in doing it.  I want to thank Neat Co for their excellent response time and especially Liza.  She is patient, nice, and very knowledgeable.  Neat Co should be very proud to have such a wonderful dedicated employee, I certainly am.  Thank you again.

Review.Titre: Excellent Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Liza didn’t give up on trying to get my scanner working again. She had tremendous patience and understanding. My scanner now works. Thanks Liza:-)

Review.Titre: Liza got right to the issues and after…
Review.Contenu: Liza got right to the issues and after a hickup, she found that I didn't tell her the correct version.  She was able to put in windows 10 instead of what I told her (windows 7).  When this was corrected, she was able to install my drivers, which were erased after update, quickly.  She was kind and thorough.  Thank you Liza

Review.Pseudo: Theresa of That Girl Taxi Serv
Review.Titre: Prefer Calling In
Review.Contenu: I was happy with calling in and putting in my number for a call back. I don't like the chat section to assist with problems. The customer rep (stephen i think?) was wonderful. He made things simple for me as i was having trouble loading the driver for nm1000.

Review.Titre: This senior tech knew what he was…
Review.Contenu: This senior tech knew what he was doing!Prior to talking with him today, it took 2-3 days 5+ hours & the other techs could not get neat working

Review.Titre: Liza C
Review.Contenu: Liza C. Clearly understood my request for help and quickly resolved issue. Very knowledgeable and thorough

Review.Titre: I received my call today and was very…
Review.Contenu: I received my call today and was very helpful!  He was very patient and helpful!  I would highly recommend the Neat for managing your expenses business or personal’

Review.Titre: The tech who assisted me efficiently solved my issues
Review.Contenu: The tech who assisted me, I believe her name was Leona was very attentive, answered all my questions and solved my concerns

Review.Titre: This time....FANTASTIC SERVICE..problem solved
Review.Contenu: This time....the service technician (Alma) was FANTASTIC.  We were able solve this tricky problem that has been hanging out there since last summer!  Thank you!!  **gsl

Review.Titre: Excellent service once I finally heard…
Review.Contenu: Excellent service once I finally heard a live person. Don was the agent that was tremendous in his knowledge and able to communicate that to resolving my problem and did so promptly.

Review.Titre: Tech support
Review.Contenu: Call back was staticky so I called support again and Liza helped me this time.Unfortunately, the conclusion was my scanner was broken and needed to be replaced.I’m buying a Raven Pro

Review.Titre: fixed my problem
Review.Contenu: The tech i chatted with Liza was very knowledgable and was able to quickly answer by questions

Review.Titre: Liza was professional and paid…
Review.Contenu: Liza was professional and paid extensive attention to details.   She was clear, concise and comprehensive in her communications with me.Most importantly she got my scanner working and working properly.

Review.Titre: Liza was patient and helpful
Review.Contenu: Liza tried to help me with my problem.  She offered many suggestions and asked me the right questions.  I had trouble explaining my issue, but we discussed it and I played around on my screen until I got back to where I wanted.  She made me aware that I could take a screen shot, but I don't know how so now I plan to learn.  Thanks for her patience.

Review.Titre: Liza was extremely helpful during the whole process,it was a pleasure working with hers
Review.Contenu: the agent Liza who was extremely helpfull during the whole process.barbara

Review.Titre: I haven’t used neatdesk in a few years…
Review.Contenu: I haven’t used neatdesk in a few years and it took a minute to figure out your upgrades, but you help line gave me everything I needed

Review.Titre: I had a great experience
Review.Contenu: I had a great experience The guy tech I had was amazing he was so polite and friendly and I could understand him perfectly. He knew exactly what the problem was and fixed it in a short time. And his response time to my email was very good

Review.Titre: Liza was very helpful she went above…
Review.Contenu: Liza was very helpful she went above and beyond to help me to sync my files from my old files in neat reciept to the new cloud version

Review.Titre: Liza
Review.Contenu: Liza, was very helpful and answered all my questions and explained to me why I couldn’t integrate with my quickbooks desktop.

Review.Titre: Excellent delivery
Review.Contenu: Excellent delivery. I look forward to hearing more webinars. She was very patient and informative.

Review.Titre: My expectations were exceeded
Review.Contenu: My expectations were exceeded.   The time it took and the patience to correct my issues was more than i could have asked for.  The effort was excellent

Review.Titre: New iMac user
Review.Contenu: A great job was done to address my issues.  Proactively provided pointers on how to better utilize the Neatdesk program.

Review.Titre: Scanner help.
Review.Contenu: I was have trouble getting my scanner to work properly. I reached out to Liza and she walked me through the process and how it works. In no time I was using my scanner and copying my receipts in no time. Thank You Liza for your quick response and help.
1/24/2023, Case#503187, Liza was Outstanding! She was professional and very knowledgeable. She resolved my problem quickly and educated me on the proper operation of the software!

Review.Titre: Super Fast help
Review.Contenu: Liza was extremely helpful and was able to solve my problem in a few minutes

Review.Titre: Super Helpful
Review.Contenu: Liza was amazing and helped tremendously, she was super patient.  Without her I could of never migrated to the new platform.

Review.Titre: file processing
Review.Contenu: I had an issue with file processing.  The agent was very helpful and quick with an answer and documentation regarding my issue.  Thank you.

Review.Contenu: Roxie was very helpful and clear in her communication and was able to clear up the issue I was having. This really was one of the BEST chats I have had with a help desk
